source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000010_TATARU<tab>Look how many people there are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000010_TATARU<tab>Alle sind hier, um uns zu helfen. Ich freu mich so!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000020_TATARU<tab>Should we get to it, then? Pick up anything that seems the least bit “device” like, and we'll make ourselves a pile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000020_TATARU<tab>Wir werden uns auch sofort auf die Suche machen! Alles, was auch nur ein bisschen nach einem Sender aussieht, nehmen wir genauestens unter die Lupe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000030_BIGGS<tab>Well if it isn't the hero of the hour! Maybe you'll change our luck─we've found bugger all without you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000030_BIGGS<tab>Ah, die Verstärkung! Nymeia sei Dank, wir stecken hier nämlich ganz schön fest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000040_TATARU<tab>Biggs! Wedge!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000040_TATARU<tab>Biggs und Wedge! Ihr seid ja auch da!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000050_BIGGS<tab>Aye, aye, well we could hardly say no to a call for aid from the Scions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000050_BIGGS<tab>Aber klar doch. Wenn unsere Freunde vom Bund der Morgenröte in der Klemme sitzen, sind wir natürlich zur Stelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000060_BIGGS<tab>Jessie collared the chief for some other business, so we'll be working twice as hard to make up for his not being here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000060_BIGGS<tab>Der Chef konnte leider nicht kommen, Jessie wollte ihn nicht weglassen. Aber dafür hängen wir uns eben doppelt ins Zeug.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000070_WEDGE<tab>Thrice as hard, even!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000070_WEDGE<tab>Doppelt und dreifach!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000080_TATARU<tab>Thank you─both of you! I'm sure we'll find that beacon in no time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000080_TATARU<tab>Ich danke euch! Zusammen finden wir das Senderdings bestimmt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000090_BIGGS<tab>Hm. I'm not seeing anything out here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000090_BIGGS<tab>Hmmm<var 1D /var>... Hier scheint nix zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000100_BIGGS<tab>D'you reckon you could squeeze in there, Wedge?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000100_BIGGS<tab>Wedge. Meinst du, du kannst dich da durchquetschen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000110_WEDGE<tab>And get stuck halfway!? No thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000110_WEDGE<tab>Willst du mich veralbern? Da pass ich doch nie durch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000120_TATARU<tab>I could try if you like!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000120_TATARU<tab>Dann versuche ich's!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000130_WEDGE<tab>Tataru, no! We couldn't ask you to do that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000130_WEDGE<tab>Nein, nein, das kommt nicht in Frage!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000140_TATARU<tab>Oh, I'll be fine! This receptionist is not afraid to get her hands dirty!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000140_TATARU<tab>Was denn! Ich bin doch längst nicht mehr nur die Empfangsdame.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000150_BIGGS<tab>Sorry, I-I meant to say─the scholars haven't finished their preliminary assessment of the site yet, so we're not supposed to venture too far in.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000150_BIGGS<tab>Pass auf! Die Leute von der Stiftung haben gesagt, dass hier hinten noch nicht alles gesichert ist. Wir sollten vorsichtig sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000160_BIGGS<tab>...Hm, what's that you got there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000160_BIGGS<tab>Hm? Hast du was gefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000170_BIGGS<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> looks promising!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000170_BIGGS<tab>Na sieh mal einer an! Das könnte doch so etwas wie ein Sender sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000180_WEDGE<tab>Uhh...isn't that the Ironworks' symbol? ...Counterfeiters?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000180_WEDGE<tab>Sieht das nicht ein bisschen aus wie unser Garlond-Abzeichen? Mit Billigimitaten sollte man vorsichtig sein<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now...<var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var> I have you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Diesmal hab ich dich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000200_BIGGS<tab>You all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000200_BIGGS<tab>Was ist mit dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000210_WEDGE<tab>What's happening!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000210_WEDGE<tab>Was ist denn jetzt los!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000220_TATARU<tab>(PANICKED WHIMPERING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000220_TATARU<tab>Oje oje oje oje oje<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Stay with me! Focus on my voice!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dass du mir bloß nicht wieder entwischst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Let expanse contract, eon become instant...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Äonen sind Momente<var 1D /var>... Was fern ist, ist nah<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000250_TATARU<tab>...Wait, this must be it! The device! This is <var 1A 02 /var>supposed<var 1A 01 /var> to happen!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000250_TATARU<tab>Das muss der Sender sein! Wir haben ihn tatsächlich gefunden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Throw wide the gates that we may pass!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Öffne mir das Tor!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000270_TATARU<tab>Safe journey, Warrior of Light. Find our friends, and bring them home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000270_TATARU<tab>Bring bitte unsere Freunde wieder zurück! Und<var 1D /var>... gute Reise!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000275_MEMORY<tab>聞いて
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000275_MEMORY<tab>Hör hin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000280_MINFILIA<tab>Your time has not yet come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000280_MINFILIA<tab>Nein. Deine Zeit ist noch nicht gekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>From endless dreams, I awake.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Erwacht aus einem nicht enden wollenden Traum,

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000300_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Something vague...yet urgent...calls me to action once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000300_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>folgte ich einem Ruf<var 1D /var>- erfüllt von düsterer Vorahnung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000310_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Rare to meet someone out here who's not a peddler themself. What brings you into the wilds this time o' night?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000310_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Wie <var 08 E905 ((eine Händlerin)) ((ein Händler)) /var> siehst du mir aber nicht aus<var 1D /var>... Was machst du hier, mitten in der Nacht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What do you mean, “this time of night”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was meinst du damit, „mitten in der Nacht“?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>But it's bright as day...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Nacht? Es ist taghell!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000320_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>(CHUCKLE)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000320_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>He he he<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000330_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Well, if it ain't the oldest joke in the book. Me grandad─gods rest his soul─used to tell that one to the barman at kickin'-out time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000330_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Den Witz machte mein Großvater früher auch immer<var 1D /var>... Wenn er mit seinen Freunden bis spät in der Taverne saß und trank.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000340_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>"An' when, pray tell, did we last have a dark night? Ye rotten old drunk ye!“ he'd reply.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000340_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>„Wollt ihr schon nach Hause, meine Freunde? Es ist ja noch nicht mal dunkel!“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000345_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000345_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>よっと

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000350_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>"Over a hundred bleedin' years ago, that's when!“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000350_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Hundert Jahre ist das jetzt her. Hundert Jahre ohne eine einzige dunkle Nacht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000360_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Hm! You've got that look down to a tee. I'd almost think you meant it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000360_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Jetzt guck doch nicht so, als wenn du nicht wissen würdest, wovon ich rede!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000370_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Ahhh, got to you, did they? Poor beggar. That explains it, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000370_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Ach<var 1D /var>... Hat dir vielleicht eine von diesen Kreaturen eins über den Kopf gegeben? Na, das wird schon wieder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000375_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>ごくり
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000375_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>ごくり

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000380_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Well, I've roads to travel and wares to sell, but you─you'd best hurry along to the town nearby.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000380_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Ich muss weiter. Aber du, du solltest dich lieber etwas ausruhen, wo es sicher ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000390_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Just head east through the trees, and aim for the shining tower. You'll find the place soon enough. 'Tis the biggest settlement for malms around.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000390_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Etwas weiter östlich ist ein großer kristallener Turm, du kannst ihn nicht verfehlen. An seinem Fuß liegt eine Stadt<var 1D /var>- die größte hier in der Gegend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000400_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Go on, now, friend. They'll take good care of you in the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000400_PEDDLEROFNORVRANDT<tab>Dort haben sich die versammelt, die noch gegen das Licht kämpfen. Sie heißt Crystarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>To dizzying heights it rises, the gleaming spire, its tip threatening to pierce the blinding canopy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Stolz ragt der Turm empor, als versuche er, den gleißend hellen Himmel zu spalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>There it will all begin anew. Between Dark and Light, the pure and the corrupt─the one true struggle...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Von dort aus entbrennt aufs Neue ein Kampf<var 1D /var>- um Dunkelheit und Licht, um Segen und Verdammnis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000430_LYNA<tab>(-???-)Halt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000430_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Halt! Stehenbleiben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000440_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Every face in this city I know. Yours I do not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000440_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Wer bist du? Und was ist das für eine Aufmachung?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000450_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)This is the threshold of the Crystarium, stranger, and I am its gatekeeper. If you would enter, you will answer my questions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000450_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Ich bin für die Sicherheit von Crystarium verantwortlich, und ich werde niemanden hineinlassen, dem ich nicht traue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000460_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)From where do you hail?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000460_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Also sag schon! Wer bist du? Und woher kommst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Where are you from?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was antwortest du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gridania.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich komme aus Gridania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich komme aus Limsa Lominsa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich komme aus Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich bin aus der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A2_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>...<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000470_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Do you take me for a fool? No such place exists.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000470_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Davon habe ich noch nie etwas gehört. Und viel Land ist ja nicht mehr übrig<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000480_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)"The Source“? What is this cryptic nonsense?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000480_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Ursprungs... was? Willst du mich auf den Arm nehmen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000490_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)You will not say? Then I have even less reason to trust you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000490_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Du schweigst? Das wird ja immer verdächtiger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000500_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Had you given me an honest answer, I would not have barred your way─we care little here for a person's place of origin. But instead you chose concealment, and I will not suffer you to pass...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000500_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Stand und Herkunft spielen in Crystarium keine Rolle. Aber mit Störenfrieden machen wir kurzen Prozess!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000501_LYNA<tab>Hah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000501_LYNA<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000510_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)That one had eaten. It must have gulped down the whole hand, ring and all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000510_LYNA<tab>(-Wächterin-)Sieht aus, als hätte er gerade eine unglückliche Seele erwischt. Was für ein schrecklicher Tod<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)Everything all right, Captain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)Lyna! Ist etwas passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000530_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Quite all right, my lord. Just a stray sin eater, and a weak one at that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000530_LYNA<tab>Ja, Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch. Es war ein verirrter Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger. Einer der Niederrangigen. Ich habe ihn erledigt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I see. Weak or not, we should be on the lookout for more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Gute Arbeit. Aber bleib wachsam. Es könnten noch mehr in der Nähe sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But I see you've met my guest. I will escort <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to the Crystarium myself...if you've no objections?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und da ist ja auch mein Gast. Ich nehme <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((ihn)) /var> mit in die Stadt<var 1D /var>- wenn die Kommandantin der Wache nichts dagegen hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000560_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Another of your mysterious friends, is it? I should have known.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000560_LYNA<tab>Ist das wieder einer von Euren mysteriösen Freunden? Na, wenn das so ist<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000570_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Very well. I'll inform the others your guest is to be given the run of the city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000570_LYNA<tab>Ich sag den Wachen Bescheid, dass <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> von nun an freien Zugang hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000580_LYNA<tab>(-Curt Gateguard-)Pray forgive my less-than-cordial welcome. May the rest of your stay with us be a pleasant one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000580_LYNA<tab>Tut mir leid wegen eben, aber man kann nicht vorsichtig genug sein<var 1D /var>... Ich wünsch dir einen angenehmen Aufenthalt in Crystarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Come with me. I will answer whatever questions you have when we are somewhere more private.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Komm. Du hast bestimmt viele Fragen, aber hier ist nicht der richtige Ort. Folge mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Right, then. Before we plunge into the wheres and wherefores, let me first thank you for answering my summons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Also<var 1D /var>... Zuerst einmal vielen Dank, dass du meinem Ruf gefolgt bist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I had intended to bring you directly to my personal quarters, but I fear my aim was...slightly off. That you were still able to make the crossing unharmed is...a great relief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mir müssen wohl die Koordinaten etwas durcheinandergeraten sein, denn eigentlich hättest du in meinem Arbeitszimmer erscheinen sollen<var 1D /var>... Aber Hauptsache, du bist jetzt hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so we come to the question of where. The realm in which you now find yourself belongs to one of the thirteen reflections or shards─the First, to be precise─even if its inhabitants are largely oblivious to the fact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>„Hier“, das ist eine der dreizehn Splitter<var 16 /var>welten, genauer gesagt die erste. Nicht, dass irgendeiner ihrer Bewohner etwas davon ahnen würde, aber so ist es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As to wherefore... Having been awarded the rather grandiose title of “Crystal Exarch,” I─in my capacity as caretaker of the Crystarium─thought to seek the aid of you and your companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Man nennt mich den Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen. Ich leite diese Stadt. Und ich war es, der euch hierher gebracht hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are the other Scions here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Heißt das, meine Freunde vom Bund der Morgenröte sind auch hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do you have any idea how much trouble you've caused?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du hast uns einiges an Problemen bereitet, weißt du das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah. That...is a question with no simple answer. But all shall be explained in due course, I promise you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, deine Freunde sind hier. Allerdings sind die Dinge etwas kompliziert<var 1D /var>... Ich werde dir alles erklären.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...An inkling, yes. I can only beg your forgiveness─matters here forced my hand. But all shall be explained in due course, I promise you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, und es tut mir schrecklich leid. Aber mir blieb keine andere Wahl. Keine Sorge, ich werde alles erklären.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Let us begin with the glaring skies up above.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber zuerst gibt es etwas anderes, das du unbedingt wissen musst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Here in the First, the world has been all but consumed by primordial Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Diese Welt leidet. Sie leidet unter dem Licht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It began a century ago, by this realm's reckoning. A luminous flood swallowing everything in its path. More than nine-tenths of this star was lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vor einhundert Jahren<var 1D /var>- einhundert unserer Jahre<var 1D /var>- ereignete sich eine fürchterliche Katastrophe: eine Lichtflut, die uns weniger als ein Zehntel unseres Landes ließ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And the fortunate few who survived are hounded by abominations born of that catastrophe even now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mit dem Licht kamen schreckliche Kreaturen, die drohten, auch die letzten Überlebenden auszurotten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"Sin eaters,“ we call them. The creature you saw earlier was one such monstrosity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wir nennen sie die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger. Einen davon hast du gerade kennengelernt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It was to save the First from this menace that I learned to bridge the rift between worlds─that I might call upon the aid of the greatest of heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Deswegen bist du hier. Deswegen habe ich die Kunst erlernt, die Welten zu überbrücken, und den stärksten aller Helden gerufen: Um diese Welt von den Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgern zu befreien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though it meant depriving a world of its champion, I had to try─for in saving the First, you would bring salvation to the Source as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nur so könnt ihr eure Welt<var 1D /var>- die Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt<var 1D /var>- retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But what manner of host harangues his guest in the middle of the road? Let us continue our talk within the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bald wird alles mehr Sinn ergeben. Komm, den Rest erzähle ich dir in Crystarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Such a proud and vibrant city...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wie lebendig die Stadt ist!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000750_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The sole sanctuary for the living in a world all but resigned to oblivion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000750_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Gebaut, um zu leben, in einer sterbenden Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Each stone was laid with hope; the town itself a symbol, a monument to defiance in the face of death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000760_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Jeder einzelne Stein gelegt in der Hoffnung, dem drohenden Tod zu trotzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No would-be hero could fail to answer its call. For who among us does not yearn for salvation?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000770_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wird sie dem Suchenden den Weg weisen, der zur Erlösung führt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Welcome to the Ocular, my private study. We can speak here without fear of being overheard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Willkommen in meinem Arbeitszimmer. Ich nenne es das Okular. Hier können wir uns ungestört unterhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have much to explain, but the truths which I must touch upon in doing so would cause only distress and confusion to the people of this world. Pray keep that in mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich hab dir viel zu erklären. Aber es ist von großer Wichtigkeit, dass die Bewohner dieser Welt nichts davon erfahren dürfen. Verstehen wir uns?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now, I am sure you are desperate to know the fate of your fellow Scions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Gut. Also, zuerst zu deinen Freunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To put it simply, they are here in the First...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie sind hier, in der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Their arrival, however, was not as recent as you may imagine. Here, time flows at a different pace from that of the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber nicht erst seit kurzem. Denn der Lauf der Zeit in den Splitter<var 16 /var>welten unterscheidet sich von dem in der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the space of a single hour in your home world, an entire year might pass in the First─and the reverse could also be true. The pace fluctuates without rhyme or reason, and it cannot be predicted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eine Stunde in deiner Welt kann einem Jahr in dieser Welt entsprechen. Und manchmal ist es andersherum. Wie sich der Lauf der Zeit verhält, ist äußerst unregelmäßig und unmöglich vorherzusagen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That said, we seem to be entering a period of near-equivalence, and thus, for the moment, you need not overly concern yourself with the passage of time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch keine Sorge. Die Fluktuationen haben in jüngster Zeit bedeutend abgenommen. Du solltest deine Welt bei deiner Rückkehr im gewohnten Zustand vorfinden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As for your companions, however... Y'shtola and Urianger have dwelled here for three winters all told, while Thancred's count stands at five.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Was aber deine Freunde angeht<var 1D /var>... Seit Thancred hier angekommen ist, sind nun schon fünf Jahre vergangen. Für Y'shtola und Urianger sind es drei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Even our more “recent” arrivals, Alphinaud and Alisaie, have lived in the First for almost a year.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und auch Alphinaud und Alisaie sind immerhin schon fast ein Jahr hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My intention had been to summon only you, but the art of reaching across worlds has proven exceedingly difficult to master. Thus it was that my <var 1A 02 /var>fumbling<var 1A 01 /var> hand closed upon those to whom your fate is most closely bound as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eigentlich wollte ich nur dich hierherrufen, aber der Transport zwischen den Welten erwies sich<var 1D /var>... schwieriger als erwartet. Ich habe dich verfehlt und versehentlich deine Freunde zu greifen bekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As they were not the object of my summons...their transference was...incomplete. Though they may appear to possess corporeal bodies, they are, in truth, merely spirits that one can see and touch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Geister, die man sehen und anfassen kann<var 1D /var>- so könnte man den Zustand beschreiben, in dem sie sich aufgrund des unvollständigen Transports nun bedauerlicherweise befinden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Consequently, while you yourself will be able to pass between worlds with relative freedom, they will not. Much as it grieves me...they are stranded here, unable to return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du kannst dich frei zwischen den Welten bewegen. Sie aber können nicht aus eigener Kraft zurückkehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then find a way to send them back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich möchte, dass du sie in ihre Heimatwelt zurückschickst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What have they been doing all this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was haben sie die ganze Zeit über hier gemacht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We spent every waking hour searching for a way to reverse the summoning. In the beginning, at least...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Natürlich wollte ich sie sofort wieder in ihre Welt bringen. Ich habe alles versucht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As you may have surmised, however, our efforts met with little success. And then we all but abandoned the endeavor once Urianger shared with us the vision he had witnessed during his journey through the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>... Aber es erwies sich schwieriger als erwartet. Und als Urianger mir berichtete, was er zwischen den Dimensionen gesehen hatte, änderte sich sowieso alles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In that chaotic no-man's-land between realms, time and space warp and blend in...unexpected ways. What Urianger saw...was the future. That which would one day come to pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Im Inter<var 16 /var>dimen<var 16 /var>sio<var 16 /var>nalen Riss, musst du wissen, vermischen sich die Grenzen zwischen Raum und Zeit. Dort sah er<var 1D /var>... die Zukunft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In his vision of tomorrow, the First was rejoined with the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eine Zukunft, in der die erste Splitter<var 16 /var>welt wieder mit der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt vereint war.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This collision of worlds brought about the Eighth Umbral Calamity, and the deaths of countless multitudes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Er sah die Folgen der durch die Vereinigung ausgelösten Achten Katastrophe. Er sah die Opfer. Und unter diesen Opfern sah er<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Amongst those who perished, Urianger clearly saw the fall of the Scions' mightiest champion. He watched you die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Die Heldin)) ((Den Helden)) /var> des Bundes der Morgenröte. Er sah dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And thus did the Scions embrace their exile, and began searching this world for a means to forestall the coming catastrophe in yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Verbissen überlegten deine Freunde, ob die Vereinigung der Welten nicht auch von der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt aus aufzuhalten sei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Their souls are stranded in the First, yes, but they have fought on, desperate to save their home─and you─from destruction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Während ihre Körper unbeseelt in der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt lagen, forschten sie hier fieberhaft nach einer Lösung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nor have their efforts been in vain: for it was they who finally established that the elimination of the sin eaters will indeed serve to prevent the calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Antwort liegt bei den Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgern. Wenn sie besiegt werden können, ist die Vereinigung der Welten und die drohende Katastrophe möglicherweise aufzuhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Considering the...circumstances of our meeting, you would be forgiven for doubting my version of events.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_000990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich könnte jetzt noch weiter ausholen, aber vielleicht ist das alles ein bisschen viel auf einmal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so, before all else, I would suggest you track down your comrades, and hear the tale from their lips.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wahrscheinlich ist es besser, wenn du so schnell wie möglich deine Freunde wiedersiehst und selbst mit ihnen sprichst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I shall, of course, be happy to assist in these reunions─and you need not make any decisions regarding your involvement until you are certain of where you stand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich werde dir nach Kräften dabei helfen, sie zu finden. Wenn du mit ihnen gesprochen hast, kannst du dich immer noch entscheiden, ob du den Kampf in der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt weiterführen willst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Meanwhile, I promise I will not rest until I have found a way to help your friends return home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und was die Rückkehr deiner Freunde in eure Welt betrifft, bin ich mir sicher, dass ich einen Weg finde, sie zurückzuschicken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>What say you? Have I earned your trust for the moment, at least?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Fürs Erste aber kann ich dich nur bitten, mir zu vertrauen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>For the moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Einverstanden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aye, but I'll see you keep that promise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich nehme dich beim Wort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>For want of a better choice...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was bleibt mir anderes übrig<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Excellent. You will not regret this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Danke. Ich werde dich nicht enttäuschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With that settled, we shall have to see about getting you ready for the road.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bevor wir aufbrechen, um deine Freunde zu finden, solltest du dich auf die Reise vorbereiten und etwas ausruhen. Der Transport zwischen den Welten kostet schließlich Kraft. Ich werde ein Zimmer für dich herrichten lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Traveling across the rift has no doubt left you weary─I will arrange for a room where you might rest in comfort. While it's being prepared, perhaps I can show you around?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bis es fertig ist, kümmern wir uns um deine Ausrüstung. Komm, ich zeig dir alles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This is the Musica Universalis, the commercial heart of the Crystarium. Aught you might need to prepare for your journeys can be purchased here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hier in Musica Universalis werden die ver<var 16 /var>schie<var 16 /var>den<var 16 /var>sten Güter gehandelt. Du solltest alles finden, um dich auf die Reise vorzubereiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, yes─you must be curious about the currency. Fear not! The gil you carry will serve you well enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Falls du dir um die Bezahlung Sorgen machst, kann ich dich beruhigen. Unsere Händler werden deine Gil anstandslos annehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Each nation once minted its own coins, but 'twas all a jumbled mess following the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vor der Lichtflut gab es in unserem Reich eine gemeinsame stabile Währung, doch sie verlor in den Wirren der Katastrophe dramatisch an Wert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>After much debate, the local merchants eventually elected to revert to the old ways, wherein a coin's value was decided by the worth of its metal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Seitdem bewerten wir alle Arten von Münzen nach ihrem Metallwert. Eine einfache und praktische Methode.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As for a unit of measurement, we agreed upon the term “gil.” A word borrowed from coins uncovered within the Crystal Tower here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Was dich aber wirklich überraschen dürfte, ist die Tatsache, dass wir unsere Währung ebenfalls Gil nennen. Wir haben uns bei der Namensgebung von den Allagern inspirieren lassen, deren Währung wir im Inneren des Kristallturms fanden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And as our traders peddled their wares across the land, so too did our usage of gil become common practice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mit unseren Händlern verbreitete sich dieser Name in alle Ecken und Enden der Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>From what Y'shtola tells me, a standard coin from the Source equates to exactly one gil here─or near enough not to matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Von Y'shtola weiß ich übrigens, dass der Wert unserer Gil ungefähr euren Gil entspricht. Du siehst also: Gil regiert auch unsere Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Our way of life has benefited greatly from the artifacts we recovered from the tower...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wir haben noch mehr Dinge in dem Turm entdeckt, die uns das tägliche Leben sehr vereinfachen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Some of which may be familiar to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Darunter auch gewisse Steine, mit denen du sicher bereits vertraut bist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But I fear it would not be practical for us to provide <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var> to which you are accustomed. You shall need a means to access the commodities of your home world...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sich alles neu zu besorgen, wäre eine jämmerliche Arbeit<var 1D /var>... Hm<var 1D /var>... Vielleicht gibt es eine Möglichkeit, Gegenstände von der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt in diese Welt zu holen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>[Are you there, my friend?]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Bist du da, meine Freundin?<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001180_FEOUL<tab>(-???-)Yes, I'm here, of course I'm here! What amusements do you have for me today?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001180_FEOUL<tab>(-???-)Endlich rufst du mich! Sag schon, wie kann ich zu Diensten sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My dear Feo Ul, paragon of pixie-kind. For you, I have the most vital task.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hallo, Feo Ul. Ich habe eine Bitte an dich, liebste aller Pixies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This fine gentleman is a friend from a distant realm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Darf ich dir einen Freund vorstellen? Er ist von sehr weit her angereist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This fine lady is a friend from a distant realm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Darf ich dir eine Freundin vorstellen? Sie ist von sehr weit her angereist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And we have need of a means to ferry things back and forth from <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home. Might you be able to...assist us in this matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sie braucht ein paar Dinge aus ihrer Heimat. Würdest du ihr bitte dabei behilflich sein?)) ((Er braucht ein paar Dinge aus seiner Heimat. Würdest du ihm bitte dabei behilflich sein?)) /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001230_FEOUL<tab>You came from beyond, didn't you!? From beyond the rift!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001230_FEOUL<tab>Ooh! Kommst du etwa von jenseits der Weltengrenze?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001240_FEOUL<tab>How wonderfully exciting! What a brave and reckless and marvelous thing you did! You've the heart of a pixie, you do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001240_FEOUL<tab>Was für ein aufregendes Leben! Dieser Mut, diese Verwegenheit! Damit können wir Pixies einfach nicht mithalten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001250_FEOUL<tab>After careful consideration, I have decided to grant you my assistance. Make a pact with me, and the fun can begin!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001250_FEOUL<tab>Ich werde dir helfen! Wenn du einen Vertrag mit mir eingehst, werde ich dir treu zu Diensten sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001260_FEOUL<tab>But answer me this, traveler: did your garments come with you when you crossed over? Your teeth? Your nails?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001260_FEOUL<tab>Aber sag mal. Vermisst du etwas, seit du die Grenze zwischen den Welten überquert hast? Kleidung, Waffen, Fingernägel<var 1D /var>... alles noch da?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001270_FEOUL<tab>Just as I thought! Then you've a good, stout connection with your home, through which all your belongings great and small may easily pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001270_FEOUL<tab>Hervorragend! Dann sollten wir deine anderen Sachen auch hier rüberschaffen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001280_FEOUL<tab>From this moment forth, I will be your [beautiful branch], and you my [adorable sapling]. Like the branch which sprouts from the sapling, our bond will flow unbroken from one to the other!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001280_FEOUL<tab>Ich werde zu deinem <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Zweig der Anmut<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> und du mein <var 48 F20243 /var><var 49 F20244 /var>Baum des Glanzes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Als solche sind wir untrennbar miteinander verbunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001290_FEOUL<tab>Raise your hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001290_FEOUL<tab>Ich warne dich. Es könnte etwas hell werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001300_FEOUL<tab>'Tis done! We are bound now, dearest sapling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001300_FEOUL<tab>So, das war's! Jetzt sind wir Zweig und Baum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001310_FEOUL<tab>Come, come, then! Make your request! Tell me your desire! I wish to visit this world of yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001310_FEOUL<tab>Hast du vielleicht schon einen Auftrag für mich? Ich würde doch zu gern einmal einen Blick über die Weltengrenze werfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mayhap a message to your friends in the Source to inform them of your safe arrival?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001320_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Gibt es niemanden, dem du sagen möchtest, dass du sicher hier angekommen bist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Who will you contact?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Send a message to Tataru.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Bring Nachricht zu Tataru.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Send a message to Krile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Bring Nachricht zu Krile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001330_FEOUL<tab>Consider it done!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001330_FEOUL<tab>Aber gerne doch! Ich bin schon unterwegs!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As you heard, that was Feo Ul of the pixies. Their kind possess an affinity for magic akin to that of arcane beings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie ist eine Pixie, ein magisches Lebewesen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>They rarely show themselves in populated areas, but Feo is insatiably curious even by pixie standards, and seems to have taken a liking to the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Für gewöhnlich halten sie sich von den Städten fern, aber es gibt auch neugierige unter ihnen, wie Feo Ul. Sie liebt es hier in Crystarium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Right, we were going to organize a room for you, weren't we? Come along.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Jetzt zu deinem Zimmer. Das sollte nun fertig sein. Komm, ich zeig es dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001370_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001370_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001380_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)...You...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001380_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Das<var 1D /var>... Das ist doch<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001390_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)I know you... You're the Warrior of Light from the Source!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001390_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Das ist doch <var 08 E905 ((die Kriegerin)) ((der Krieger)) /var> des Lichts. Aus dem Ursprung. Wie kommt <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> hierher?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Warrior of Darkness...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Und du bist doch<var 1D /var>... ein Krieger der Dunkelheit!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>And who are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wer bist du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001400_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)What? Did you just... You can hear me!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001400_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Ha? ... Du kannst mich hören?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Oh, gods, how long has it been...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001410_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Wie<var 1D /var>... Wie ist das möglich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)...Aye...aye, that was what I called myself in your world... The “Warrior of Darkness.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001420_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Krieger der Dunkelheit<var 1D /var>... Ja, so habt ihr mich in eurer Welt genannt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>My real name is Ardbert. I used an alias in the Source. A daft one, looking back...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001430_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Mein richtiger Name ist Ardbert. In der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt benutzte ich einen anderen, ähnlichen Namen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)...“And who are you?” <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> says. An enemy not worth remembering, apparently...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001440_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(-???-)Wer ich bin, fragst du? Ich hatte gehofft, du würdest dich an mich erinnern<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001450_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>My name is Ardbert. In the First, I was a Warrior of Light, but in the Source you knew me as the Warrior of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001450_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Mein Name ist Ardbert. Ich war ein Krieger des Lichts der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt. In deiner Welt fiel ich als Krieger der Dunkelheit. Durch deine Hand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001460_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you recall my tale, it was my comrades and I who caused the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001460_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Meine Freunde und ich<var 1D /var>... sind für die Lichtflut verantwortlich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We thought our home doomed. And so we listened to the Ascians─let them guide us to the Source, and tried to hasten their godsdamned Ardor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001470_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wir dachten, wir würden alles verlieren<var 1D /var>... Die Ascians verleiteten uns in die Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt zu gehen und die Vereinigung der Welten herbeizuführen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001480_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I remember when we fell, defeated by you and yours. I remember our audience with Minfilia─how she listened to our pleas, and returned our souls to the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001480_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Gegen euch kamen wir nicht an. Erst nachdem wir das Orakel<var 1D /var>- Minfilia<var 1D /var>- trafen, konnten unsere Seelen wieder in den ersten Splitter zurückkehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The Flood was poised to swallow Norvrandt...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001490_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Als wir unsere Heimat betraten, begann die Lichtflut gerade, den letzten Kontinent, Norvrandt, zu verschlingen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001500_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia and my friends, they...they surrendered what little they had left to hold it back. Just faded away...leaving me to bear witness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001500_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia und meine Freunde konnten die Tragödie mit allerletzter Kraft aufhalten<var 1D /var>... und verschwanden. Mich ließen sie zurück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tell me, do you know the year? How much time has passed since we caused the Flood?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001510_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wie lange mag das nun her sein? Weißt du, wie viel Zeit seit der Lichtflut vergangen ist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>A hundred years... A hundred long years...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Einhundert Jahre<var 1D /var>... Einhundert lange Jahre<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>My hands find no purchase. My gestures catch no eye. And my pleas, be they whispered or screamed, reach not a single ear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001530_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was ich auch tue<var 1D /var>- niemand sieht mich. So laut ich auch schreie<var 1D /var>- niemand hört mich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I am a shade, cursed to do naught but drift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001540_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich bin ein Geist<var 1D /var>- verdammt dazu, durch diese Welt zu streifen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I feel as if I've been walking forever... I hardly noticed when my mind and body began to fray at the edges.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich wandere schon so lange in Einsamkeit, dass ich manchmal vergesse, dass ich überhaupt noch existiere.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001560_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Then “bang,” my senses were sharp again. I felt like a fish being reeled in, and before I knew it, I found myself in this room.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001560_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber dann umhüllte mich dieses Funkeln. Etwas zog an meinem Verstand<var 1D /var>- und auf einmal war ich hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Why is it that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> can see me? What are you even doing here, come to that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001570_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Warum kannst du mich sehen? Warum bist du hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You were summoned to save the First?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Man hat dich hierhergerufen, damit du die erste Splitter<var 16 /var>welt rettest?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>A waste of time. This world is beyond saving─like those who try to save it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was für ein Unfug. Diese Welt ist nicht zu retten. Und wer es versucht<var 1D /var>... ist selbst verloren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Muddled as my mind may be, I've not forgotten that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Was mich angeht<var 1D /var>... Ich habe schon längst vergessen, wofür ich kämpfe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But if fate has brought me to you─the one person in this godsforsaken world who can see and hear me─then perhaps there is a reason I endured.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Aber dass ich hier bin<var 1D /var>... dass du mich sehen kannst<var 1D /var>... Das kann kein Zufall sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If I can find out why I was left behind, then maybe...maybe I can bring this journey of mine to an end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich muss wissen, warum ich zurückgeblieben bin. Es muss einen Grund geben. Diesmal werde ich meinen Weg bis zu Ende gehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Well. I'll be watching, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ich werde dich bei diesem Abenteuer begleiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But do me a favor. Be careful out there. This world has had its fill of heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Doch sieh dich gut vor. In dieser Welt ist kein Platz für Helden mehr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, how did you find your new quarters? I trust you were able to rest?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wie gefällt dir dein Zimmer? Hast du dich etwas erholt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Well enough, thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ein wenig hell, aber es ging.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I had a ghostly visitor...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Bis auf den Geist war es gemütlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That is good to hear. Should you want for anything, pray let me know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du scheinst jedenfalls guter Dinge zu sein. Wenn ich etwas für dich tun kann, lass es mich wissen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I...was not aware the room was haunted. And...you <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> rather tired... Well, should you receive another visitation, be sure to let me know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ein Geist? Hier? Sicher war das nur ein Traum. Sag mir bitte Bescheid, wenn ich etwas für dich tun kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now, let us return to the subject of the Scions' whereabouts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Also. Ich werde dir nun erklären, wo deine Freunde sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This map shows the lands of Norvrandt, the only area to be spared the Flood of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hier. Das ist alles, was uns nach der Lichtflut geblieben ist: der Kontinent Norvrandt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The Crystarium is here, in the region known as Lakeland.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Region, in der sich Crystarium befindet, wird das Seenland genannt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To the north is the faerie kingdom of Il Mheg. That is where you will find Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Im Norden liegt das Reich der Feen, Il Mheg. Dort hält sich Urianger auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To the east lies the once-prosperous civilization of Rak'tika. Y'shtola is stationed there, in the heart of the forest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Im Osten erstreckt sich seit Urzeiten der große Wald Rak'tika. Dort hat Y'shtola ihr Lager aufgeschlagen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alas, neither location can be reached without considerable difficulty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Leider ist es nicht ohne Weiteres möglich, diese Regionen zu betreten. Es gibt zunächst noch ein paar Vor<var 16 /var>bereitungen zu treffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As such, I would suggest you first seek out one of the twins─each of whom is stationed but a short flight from the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Suche daher zuerst Alphinaud oder Alisaie auf. Sie kannst du ohne Umwege mit einem Flugtier erreichen. Wir werden dir eins bereitstellen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alphinaud is on Kholusia, an island off the western shore. It is home to a city called Eulmore, where the rich and privileged while away their days in idleness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alphinaud befindet sich auf Kholusia, einer Insel im Westmeer. Dort haben sich die Adligen und Reichen in eine Stadt namens Eulmore zurückgezogen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For his part in furthering our cause, Alphinaud journeyed there to meet with the citizenry and forge alliances. From what I hear, he has since kept himself busy gathering information around the main settlement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Um herauszufinden, wie diese Welt zu retten ist, hielt er es für das Beste, sich zuerst mit ihren Bewohnern vertraut zu machen. „Informationen zu sammeln“ scheint so etwas wie eine Leidenschaft von ihm zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alisaie, meanwhile, traveled south to the arid wastes of Amh Araeng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alisaie hingegen ist in Amh Araeng, ein Gebiet im Süden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>They lie upon the very edge of the inhabitable world, where the Flood of Light was halted. Those who dwell there live in constant fear of attack by the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es grenzt unmittelbar an die Landmassen, die von der Lichtflut verschluckt wurden. Ein Grenzland, das ständigen Angriffen der Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger ausgesetzt ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In contrast to her brother, Alisaie felt that her energies would better be spent learning about the enemy. And thus she sells her services as a guard, both to hone her skills and gather information on our foe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Anders als ihr Bruder hielt Alisaie es für ratsam, mehr über den Feind zu erfahren. Sie ist eine hartgesottene Kämpferin, eine unerbittliche Beschützerin der Region.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So, will it be Kholusia or Amh Araeng? It matters not which you choose to visit first.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich überlasse es dir, ob du zuerst nach Kholusia oder nach Amh Araeng gehst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Simply inform me once you have made your decision, and I will see to it that you are provided with a suitable mount.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Teile mir nur deine Entscheidung mit, und ich werde alles Nötige in die Wege leiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, but you must be wondering about Thancred. He has taken up with...a new companion, and is presently engaged as a wandering hunter of sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, natürlich. Dann wäre da ja noch Thancred. Soweit ich weiß, zieht er mit seiner Begleitung durchs Land und jagt Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger, wo immer er sie auftreiben kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Being ever on the move, his whereabouts are often difficult to ascertain, but I am certain your paths will cross ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Man weiß nie, wo man ihn findet. Meistens taucht er auf, wenn man es am wenigsten erwartet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001840_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The whistling breeze, mute. The pounding surf, frozen. Time itself takes a breath...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001840_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wind und Wellen kennen weder Anfang noch Ende.
Alles, was auf dieser Insel jemals stillstand, war die Zeit selbst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001850_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>At Light's edge, all is perfectly still. The world captured in a painting; locked in a moment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001850_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Gehüllt in Licht, von ihm gänzlich verhangen,
liegt sie regungslos, einem Gemälde gleich, im Meer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001860_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Music, faint and fleeting, drifts coastward on the lifeless air...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001860_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Eine Musik, kaum hörbar im Wind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001870_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And in the distance, beyond the broken earth, a city beckons...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001870_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Bis zur Stadt in der Ferne war nichts als wildes Land.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001880_ALPHINAUD<tab>(-???-)And how is business today, Mistress Theva?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001880_ALPHINAUD<tab>(-???-)Hallo! Wie geht's, wie steht's?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001890_THEVA<tab>Oh, frenetic. Look. I have a new customer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001890_THEVA<tab>Willkommen. Der Wind hat heute einen ungewöhnlichen Gast hergeweht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001900_ALPHINAUD<tab>...'Tis good to see you, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich hoffe, du hast nicht allzu lange auf mich gewartet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001910_ALPHINAUD<tab>The barley seeds you wanted. They should produce a better harvest than the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001910_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hier ist das Saatgut. Es sollte dir mehr Weizen bescheren als das alte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001920_THEVA<tab>What, just like that? Oh, Alphinaud, you really are a dear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001920_THEVA<tab>Danke, dass du daran gedacht hast. Auf dich ist wirklich Verlass, Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001930_THEVA<tab>Well, I'd best be tidying up some of those empty shacks before the pests move in. Keep an eye on the place while I'm out, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001930_THEVA<tab>Ich geh und räume eins der verlassenen Häuser auf. Es werden immer mehr<var 1D /var>... Macht ihr es euch hier nur gemütlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001940_ALPHINAUD<tab>It seems an age since last we spoke. Not since the prisoner exchange in Doma. And Yotsuyu...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001940_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bei den Zwölf, was haben wir uns lange nicht gesehen! Es kommt mir vor, als wär der Gefangenen<var 16 /var>austausch eine Ewigkeit her.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001950_ALPHINAUD<tab>It has been even longer for me, of course, if you count the days I have spent here. But the time has only added to the relief I feel, seeing you safe and well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber was bedeutet schon Zeit<var 1D /var>... Ach, ich freu mich wirklich, dich gesund und munter wiederzusehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Me? I was more worried about you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was soll ich denn erst sagen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We thought we'd lost you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir haben nicht aufgehört, nach dir zu suchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hah! Alisaie said much the same thing. I don't think I've ever had such a scolding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Haha! Du hättest sehen sollen, wie Alisaie mich bei unserem Wieder<var 16 /var>sehen begrüßt hat. Fuchsteufelswild war sie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001970_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I believe an exchange of news is in order. Come─tell me of your arrival, and all that came before!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mir ist nach Feiern zumute, aber vielleicht sollten wir uns erst einmal ausführlich unterhalten. Es ist ja so viel passiert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001980_ALPHINAUD<tab>I see. Both the Exarch and Alisaie told me what they knew of events, but I had stubbornly clung on to the hope that all-out war might yet be avoidable...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hm<var 1D /var>... Es gibt also wirklich Krieg mit den Garlearn. Der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch und Alisaie hatten schon so etwas angedeutet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001990_ALPHINAUD<tab>And poor Tataru─she must be sick with worry. We must endeavor to return as soon as we may...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die arme Tataru. Sie muss krank sein vor Sorge. Wenn wir doch nur schon alle nach Hause könnten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001991_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twould be nice to bring her good tidings for a change.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_001991_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber vorher haben wir noch ein paar Abenteuer zu bestehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002000_ALPHINAUD<tab>But before we bid this world farewell, we must first ensure that it is not rejoined to the Source. We must prevent the Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sprechen über die Vereinigung der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt mit der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt. Und eine mögliche Achte Katastrophe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger's vision of the future has, I fear, every chance of coming true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger hat sie gesehen. Und ich befürchte, dass sie wirklich eintreten könnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002020_ALPHINAUD<tab>By his description, the catalyst for the Calamity was a formless and deadly weapon employed by the Garlean Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Er sagte, dass eine Waffe der Garlear<var 1D /var>- eine, die alles Lebende vernichtet<var 1D /var>- die Achte Katastrophe auslöst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Which can only mean one thing: Black Rose. Gaius was telling you the truth. When we were on the trail of the Ascians, we saw evidence that the gas was being manufactured once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich habe keinen Zweifel, dass damit die Schwarze Rose gemeint ist. Ich habe selbst gesehen, wie die Garlear wieder damit begonnen haben, das tödliche Gas herzustellen und einzusetzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Gaius was adamant that the project had been scrapped. But so long as there are wars to be waged, there will always be those determined to win by any means.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sogar Gaius dachte, dass sich die Garlear von der Waffe abgewandt hätten. Doch solange die Völker Krieg führen, wird es immer solche geben, die vor keinem Mittel zurück<var 16 /var>schrecken<var 1D /var>- sei es auch noch so grausam.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>And thus simply destroying the existing stores of Black Rose would do little to alter fate's course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Um die Katastrophe abzuwenden, wird es allerdings nicht reichen, einfach alle Vorräte der Schwarzen Rose in der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt zu vernichten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002060_ALPHINAUD<tab>In that sense, our involuntary journey here to the First was something of a boon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Eigentlich ist es ein Glücksfall, dass wir in die erste Splitter<var 16 /var>welt gerufen wurden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Together with the Exarch, we've developed a theory as to how we believe the Rejoining will be set in motion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Erst das Wissen des Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen hat es uns ermöglicht, eine genauere Vorstellung davon zu bekommen, was die Vereinigung der Welten auslöst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002080_ALPHINAUD<tab>I am sure Urianger himself will cover the subject in more detail...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Einzelheiten überlasse ich besser Urianger, aber etwas kann ich vielleicht schon vorwegnehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I can tell you the process requires that both worlds─the Source and the First─be facing an existential threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Um eine Vereinigung herbeizuführen, müssen sowohl die Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt als auch die Splitter<var 16 /var>welt durch ein großes Unglück destabilisiert werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002100_ALPHINAUD<tab>One being sin eaters, of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hier in der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt sind das die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>They are a menace that I would dearly love to remove, and not just to avert a calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich täte nichts lieber, als jeder dieser Bestien eigenhändig den Hals umzudrehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>I may be a stranger to this world, but I will not stand idly by and let innocent people be slaughtered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nicht nur, weil ich meine Heimatwelt retten möchte. Wenn ich sehe, wie die Bewohner dieser Welt leiden<var 1D /var>... kann ich nicht untätig zusehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002130_ALPHINAUD<tab>That is what brought me to the gates of Eulmore. Ignoring its pretentions as a kind of capital city to what remains of the world, it is nonetheless a center of power and authority.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Außerdem will ich mehr über Eulmore erfahren. Dort sitzen die Herrscher dieser Welt<var 1D /var>- oder die, die sich dafür halten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>If any solutions are to be found, I believe our search should begin there. What say you, old friend? Hungry for another adventure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je mehr wir über diese Welt wissen, desto besser können wir ihr helfen. Du begleitest mich doch, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>And so we take to the road once more!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Natürlich tust du das! Endlich geht es wieder los. Wir gehen wieder auf Abenteuer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>That gate up ahead is known as the “Open Arms,” and Eulmore itself lies beyond.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Auf der anderen Seite dieser Siedlung liegt das Tor der Offenen Arme. Dort muss jeder durch, der nach Eulmore möchte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>This, meanwhile, is the aptly named “Gatetown.” The dwelling place of the many desperate souls who hope to be chosen to live in the city proper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber wie du siehst, sind wir nicht die Einzigen, die dort hineinwollen. Viele warten seit Jahren vergebens darauf, auserwählt zu werden, und hausen hier, in Torstadt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002180_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Oh! I thought I recognized you. Brought a new friend, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002180_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Na, sieh mal einer an. Der kleine Knabe hat jemand Neues mitgebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002190_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Heh heh heh heh... I'll bet you've got a trick or two up your sleeve. Maybe even <var 1A 02 /var>three<var 1A 01 /var>! Care to show me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002190_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>He he he<var 1D /var>... Vielleicht lässt man dich ja rein<var 1D /var>- wenn du was kannst, was sonst keiner draufhat. Sag, was machst du denn Tolles?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>He's not here to compete. Leave him be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Er ist nur zu Besuch hier. Lass ihn, er wird keinem etwas wegnehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>She's not here to compete. Leave her be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sie ist nur zu Besuch hier. Lass sie, sie wird keinem etwas wegnehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002220_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>What!? I was only making conversation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002220_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Was denn? Man wird doch wohl noch fragen dürfen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002230_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>(-???-)Ladies and gentlemen! Your attention pleeease!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002230_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>(-???-)Meine Damen und Herren! Dürfte ich um Aufmerksamkeit bitten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002240_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Greetings to our hopeful petitioners, one and all! Eulmore extends its warmest regards!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002240_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Wie geht es denn unseren sehr geehrten Städterinnen und Städtern in spe? Freut ihr euch auf eine rosige Zukunft?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002250_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Let it be known that a lady of distinction wishes to dine on fish divine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002250_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Heute haben wir wieder eine Riesenchance für euch: Den Damen des Hofes gelüstet es nach einer Fischspeise, die ihre Gaumen verzückt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002260_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>We seek a master culinarian who can guarantee seafood perfection! Dazzle the matron with your delicious dishes, and life in the city will be yours to enjoy. Even on days when fish is not on the menu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002260_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Wer traut sich das zu? Als Lohn winkt ein Leben in der Stadt! Auf Lebenszeit<var 1D /var>- oder solange es den Damen des Hofes beliebt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002270_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Who among you will answer the call? Name yourself or another, we mind not at all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002270_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Also? Wo sind die mutigen Kandidaten? Los, ich warte auf Vorschläge!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002280_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Fish, is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002280_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Ein Fischgericht ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002290_GATETOWNMAN<tab>Was there anyone?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002290_GATETOWNMAN<tab>Gibt's da einen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002300_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>What about that girl?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002300_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>Vielleicht dieses Mädchen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do you recall how I said Eulmore was a center of power and authority? Well, that is not the only reason for its fame.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002310_ALPHINAUD<tab>Eulmore nennt sich gerne die Hauptstadt der Welt. Aber sie hat noch einen anderen Namen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002320_ALPHINAUD<tab>It is also known as the “city of final pleasures.” The noble and the wealthy who survived the Flood gathered here to live out the rest of their days in decadent abandon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002320_ALPHINAUD<tab>„Die letzte Hauptstadt des Vergnügens.“ Hier haben sich die Adligen und Reichen zurückgezogen, die die Lichtflut überlebt haben, um ihre letzten Tage in Dekadenz und voller hemmungslosem Genuss zu verbringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002330_ALPHINAUD<tab>A poor man could sooner pass through the eye of a needle than Eulmore's gates. The only way the commonfolk can enter this perverted paradise is if they fulfill the whim of one of the privileged. And so they are picked over like market produce...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Andere haben nur Zutritt, wenn sie dringend benötigte Aufgaben über<var 16 /var>nehmen können. Ihnen bleibt nichts anderes übrig, als darauf zu warten, für eine Arbeit „auserwählt“ zu werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002340_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Ohoho! What a catch! We'll not be throwing this one back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002340_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Ja, ich glaube, wir haben eine Gewinnerin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002350_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Having seen your all-too-obvious charms, we welcome you with open arms! Come, join us in the city of splendor, and live out your life in an ecstasy of endeavor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002350_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Du wirst nach Eulmore gehen, in die Stadt des Glücks! Dort wirst du die Gelegenheit haben, dein Können unter Beweis zu stellen<var 1D /var>- bis ans Ende deiner Tage!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002360_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Ah, just look at those expectant faces! What could you <var 1A 02 /var>possibly<var 1A 01 /var> be waiting for!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002360_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Was seh ich da? Bettelnde Blicke und gierige Gesichter? Ich weiß, ich weiß<var 1D /var>... Wir haben euch natürlich noch etwas mitgebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002370_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Well, well, what have we here!? An extra share of meol to celebrate our newest resident!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002370_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Lasst uns das glückliche Schicksal der jungen Frau feiern! Meol für alle!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002380_CLOWNOFRED<tab>For you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002380_CLOWNOFRED<tab>Jawoll!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002390_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Enjoy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002390_CLOWNOFBLUE<tab>Esst! <var 1A 02 /var>Esst<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002391_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Ah, at last!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002391_GATETOWNMIDDLEAGE<tab>Endlich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002392_GATETOWNMAN<tab>Thank goodness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002392_GATETOWNMAN<tab>Danke!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002393_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>Over here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002393_GATETOWNWOMAN<tab>Ich auch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Meol” is a foodstuff which Eulmore routinely doles out to the people of Gatetown, and apparently a staple for its citizens as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das Meol wird regelmäßig an die Bewohner von Torstadt verteilt. In Eulmore ist es so etwas wie ein Hauptnahrungsmittel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Many here rely on it to survive in these times of scarcity. Yet the whole arrangement just seems...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Zeiten sind hart. Viele sind von der kostenlosen Essenausgabe abhängig.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002411_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, let us just say it leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002411_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich aber<var 1D /var>... konnte bisher darauf verzichten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>There you are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Haben wir dich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>The thief who claimed the harvest on <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> behalf. Hand it over.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du hast dich als mein Bote ausgegeben und genommen, was mir gehört. Ich brauche es für ein wichtiges Geschäft. Gib es mir wieder zurück!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002440_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)Wha─ I...I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002440_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blauhaariger Mystel-)Aa ... Aaah<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002450_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)Forgive me, I just─ I have to get into the city!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002450_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blauhaariger Mystel-)Bitte, verzeiht mir! Ich will doch so gerne nach Eulmore!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002460_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)I have no family, and all my friends have already been chosen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002460_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blauhaariger Mystel-)Ich habe keine Familie mehr<var 1D /var>... und meine Freunde sind alle schon auserwählt worden<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002470_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)No one here gives a damn about me. When the meol gets handed out, I'm lucky if I get a smell of it!
