target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002470_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blauhaariger Mystel-)Ich habe niemanden<var 1D /var>... Und von dem Meol bekomme ich auch immer nur die allerletzten Krümel ab<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002480_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)No matter what I do, they won't call out my name! I'm so tired─I'm so <var 1A 02 /var>bloody<var 1A 01 /var> hungry...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002480_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blauhaariger Mystel-)Nie schlägt mich jemand vor, egal wie sehr ich mich auch anstreng. Ich hab Hunger<var 1D /var>...<var 1D /var>... Ich kann nicht mehr!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002490_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blue-haired Mystel-)I thought maybe I could steal your idea─get in that way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002490_KAISHIRR<tab>(-Blauhaariger Mystel-)Ich hab's getan, weil ich einfach keinen anderen Ausweg mehr weiß.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>...What is your name?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wie heißt du eigentlich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002510_KAISHIRR<tab>Kai-Shirr...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002510_KAISHIRR<tab>Kai-Shirr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tell me then, Kai-Shirr─must it be Eulmore or nothing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Also Kai-Shirr, verrate mir. Warum muss es denn unbedingt Eulmore sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>What of the Crystarium? They may not offer charity, but you would be fairly compensated for any work you did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Warum gehst du nicht nach Crystarium? Dort könntest du dich sicher auch nützlich machen, und man würde dich gerecht bezahlen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002540_KAISHIRR<tab>No, no, it has to be Eulmore!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002540_KAISHIRR<tab>Nein<var 1D /var>... Es ist Eulmore oder nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002550_KAISHIRR<tab>That's where all my friends are. We made a promise that we'd live together in paradise...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002550_KAISHIRR<tab>Alle meine Freunde sind da. Wir haben uns geschworen, es irgendwann einmal in die Stadt der Reichen zu schaffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002560_ALPHINAUD<tab>...I was to make my deal with the Ondo at the Clave. Listen carefully, and I shall tell you my plans for the business, and how best to arouse the Eulmorans' interest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hör gut zu. Ich werde dir jetzt erklären, wie du nach Eulmore reinkommst. Kennst du den Leuchtturm bei der Venmont-Werft?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002570_KAISHIRR<tab>You'll give me your place? Just like that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002570_KAISHIRR<tab>Heißt das, ich soll<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>I'm giving you a chance, nothing more. What comes of it is entirely up to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das heißt, dass ich dir eine Chance gebe. Alles Weitere musst du alleine machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002590_KAISHIRR<tab>...I understand! Oh thank you, thank you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002590_KAISHIRR<tab>Ich<var 1D /var>... Danke! Vielen Dank!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002600_ALPHINAUD<tab>This was but one path─there will be others. But for young Kai-Shirr, it was the difference between life and death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Für uns war der Plan eine gute Gelegenheit, doch wir werden uns schon etwas anderes ausdenken. Für den Jungen aber ist er eine Chance auf ein neues Leben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002610_ALPHINAUD<tab>I do not regret my decision...yet I will admit that a part of me wonders if it was for the best.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hoffentlich macht er das Beste draus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002620_ALPHINAUD<tab>We strive to bring swift salvation to this world, that countless lives might be saved─not least your own. Even if it came at the cost of one man, should I have forged on regardless...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002620_ALPHINAUD<tab>Und hoffentlich werde ich diese Entscheidung nicht bereuen. Schließlich haben wir eine Welt zu retten. Es gilt, dich zu retten. Und wer weiß, wie viel Zeit uns noch bleibt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>That's not who you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du hast dich richtig entschieden, Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quite possibly. Meaning we'd better hurry up and think of a new plan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Dann müssen wir uns aber ein bisschen reinhängen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002630_ALPHINAUD<tab>I suppose not... Were Estinien here, he would most likely scoff at my soft-heartedness. “Same old Alphinaud. Ever the slave to sentiment.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dein Wort in Nymeias Ohr. Wenn Estinien hier wäre, hätte er sicher ein strengeres Urteil über mich gefällt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I thank you for your kind words, nonetheless. Let us see to it that both these stories have a happy ending.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Trotzdem, danke. Es wird schon ein gutes Ende nehmen. Für alle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We will find another way, I promise you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Natürlich. Ich habe nicht die Absicht, schon aufzugeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Shall we return to Wright, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Komm. Kehren wir nach Werfting zurück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Moment mal<var 1D /var>... Was ist denn das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can't be sure, but I-I think someone's in trouble!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Liegt da nicht jemand?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come on, they may need our help!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Da muss was passiert sein. Schnell, da braucht jemand unsere Hilfe!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002700_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Redemption is beyond us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002700_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Diese Welt ist nicht zu retten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The lament of all but saints and fools...and the comfort of the lords and ladies of this accursed place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002710_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Wer das nicht einsieht, ist ein Heiliger oder ein Narr, oder einer der tumben Bewohner dieser einfältigen Stadt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Once, they held fast against the madness, only to embrace the coming cataclysm and delight in the end of days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002720_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>In der einst so grundsoliden Stadt des Meeres klingt nur noch schallendes Lachen dem Weltenende entgegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Perhaps in rapture they seek to lose themselves and the misery they share...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002730_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ein Komödienspiel, um die Traurigkeit zu vergessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Or perhaps for them alone the promise of eternal pleasure really does hold true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002740_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Oder sollte es gar so sein, dass dieser Stadt allein die Ewigkeit versprochen war?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002750_DULIACHAI<tab>Ooh? Who's this then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002750_DULIACHAI<tab>Nanu? Wer ist denn das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord and Lady Chai, pray forgive our intrusion. I am given to understand you were in search...of an <var 1A 02 /var>artist<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bitte entschuldigt unser unvermitteltes Auftreten. Ich bin Maler und suche die Eheleute Chai.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002770_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ahh, you must be the new, uh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002770_CHAINUZZ<tab>Aaah, ausgezeichnet. Wir haben schon auf den nächsten Kandidaten gewartet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002780_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, goodness me! What an adorable boy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002780_DULIACHAI<tab>Ach, was für ein entzückendes Bürschchen er ist!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002790_DULIACHAI<tab>That silken hair, those pearly cheeks...oh, and you even smell wonderful─like a bed of flowers!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002790_DULIACHAI<tab>Das Haar wie Seide, sein Gesicht wie aus Wachs. Und mir ist, als rieche er nach einem Strauß Frühlingsblumen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002800_DULIACHAI<tab>I approve of this one, dearest! I am <var 1A 02 /var>positive<var 1A 01 /var> he will paint us the most delightful pictures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002800_DULIACHAI<tab>Liebster. Von allen gefällt <var 1A 02 /var>er<var 1A 01 /var> mir am besten. <var 1A 02 /var>Er<var 1A 01 /var> soll das Bild malen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>I, um, er, y-yes... Ahem. Well, as long as he paints better than that talentless wretch we sent packing last week...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Mhm. Er macht einen gewissenhafteren Eindruck als der letzte. Ein finsterer, ungeschickter Lümmel war das.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002820_DULIACHAI<tab>Wonderful, wonderful! Welcome to Eulmore...um, er...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002820_DULIACHAI<tab>Dann ist es also entschieden! Wie heißt du noch gleich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alphinaud, if it please you, my lady. And this...is my assistant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alphinaud. Und das ist <var 08 E905 ((meine fleißige Assistentin)) ((mein fleißiger Assistent)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Your...assistant? I've heard of folk bringing in family members, but this seems a bit irregular. Aren't you a little young to have a protégé?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Es gibt ja immer welche, die jemanden aus ihrer Familie mit reinbringen wollen. Aber <var 08 E905 ((eine Assistentin)) ((ein Assistent)) /var>, das hört man nicht oft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002850_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are family in all but name, my lord. Though we share no blood, we have stood by each other through life's many challenges, resolved to prevail together─or not at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002850_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sind in der Tat wie Familie. <var 08 E905 ((Sie stand in schweren Zeiten stets nah an meiner Seite)) ((Er stand in schweren Zeiten stets an meiner Seite)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of all people, 'tis he who best understands my work. With his unique insight guiding my hand, the art I create is sure to satisfy your expectations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Keiner versteht meinen Schaffensprozess so gut wie er. Seine Anwesenheit erst ermöglicht mir, mit meinem Werk der Schönheit Ihrer Frau Gemahlin gerecht zu werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002870_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of all people, 'tis she who best understands my work. With her unique insight guiding my hand, the art I create is sure to satisfy your expectations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002870_ALPHINAUD<tab>Keiner versteht meinen Schaffensprozess so gut wie sie. Ihre Anwesenheit erst ermöglicht mir, mit meinem Werk der Schönheit Ihrer Frau Gemahlin gerecht zu werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once the picture is begun, of course, I shall have no need of constant encouragement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Äh, das betrifft freilich nur die Vor<var 16 /var>bereitungen. Sobald ich einmal male, arbeite ich allein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002890_ALPHINAUD<tab>And so I wondered, rather than <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> being in your way, might it then be permissible for my assistant to explore the city <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has so longed to see?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es<var 1D /var>... Es ist doch bestimmt gestattet, dass <var 08 E905 ((meine Assistentin)) ((mein Assistent)) /var> sich ein wenig in der Stadt umsieht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Out of gratitude for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> <var 1A 02 /var>priceless<var 1A 01 /var> contribution to my art, I thought it only fair that I make this humble request on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> behalf.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das schöne Eulmore hat einer Künstlerseele so viel an Inspiration zu bieten. Es wäre höchst bedauerlich, wenn wir diese Gelegenheit verpassen sollten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002910_DULIACHAI<tab>Oooh, did you ever hear of such devotion! Of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> your assistant must have <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> wish! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> shall be free to roam to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> heart's content!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002910_DULIACHAI<tab>Was für hinreißende Persön<var 16 /var>lich<var 16 /var>keiten ihr seid! Selbstverständlich dürft ihr euch etwas umsehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002920_DULIACHAI<tab>...Isn't that right, darling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002920_DULIACHAI<tab>Oder, mein Liebster?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002930_CHAINUZZ<tab>Uh... Oh, yes. Yes, of course, dearest. Q-Quite right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002930_CHAINUZZ<tab>Hm? Äh<var 1D /var>... Ja, wenn du meinst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002940_ALPHINAUD<tab>That's him. That's Vauthry!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002940_ALPHINAUD<tab>Da! Das ist Vauthry. Der Herrscher von Eulmore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002950_ALPHINAUD<tab>He is attended by sin eaters...? But how does he keep them from attacking?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das sind Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger! Aber warum sind sie so zahm?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002960_KAISHIRR<tab>(-???-)Mercy... Mercy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002960_KAISHIRR<tab>(-???-)Ahh ... Aaah ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>By the Twelve!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das ist doch<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kai-Shirr! What happened to you!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bei den Zwölf! Kai-Shirr!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002990_VAUTHRY<tab>Who are these impudent louts? I do not recall requesting their presence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_002990_VAUTHRY<tab>Ts! Was soll das? Was habt ihr hier so reinzuplatzen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord Vauthry! What is the meaning of this? Why is this poor man bleeding to death on your floor!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord Vauthry! Was geht hier vor sich? Warum quält ihr diesen Jungen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003010_VAUTHRY<tab>Why? You ask me why? Because criminals must be punished, and this man is guilty of fraud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003010_VAUTHRY<tab>„Warum?“ Weil Sünden nun mal bestraft gehören. Er hat uns angelogen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003020_VAUTHRY<tab>He came to us claiming to be a man of business, yet his subsequent conduct has shown him to be anything but!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003020_VAUTHRY<tab>Gute Geschäfte hat er uns versprochen. Aber je mehr wir ihn durchschütteln, desto weniger kommt aus ihm raus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003030_VAUTHRY<tab>Eulmore is a city built on love for one's fellow man. Those who have naught to give and live only to take are a blight upon our society!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003030_VAUTHRY<tab>Eulmore ist eine Stadt, die auf gegenseitiger Unterstützung basiert, eine Stadt der Liebe! Doch dieser Nichtsnutz will nur haben haben haben, obwohl er nichts zu geben hat!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003040_VAUTHRY<tab>To atone for this crime, I ordered that he fling himself from the balcony.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003040_VAUTHRY<tab>Und deswegen! Habe ich befohlen, dass er<var 1D /var>- als Strafe für seine Lügen<var 1D /var>- die Stadt auf dem Luftweg verlassen wird!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003050_VAUTHRY<tab>And he had the <var 1A 02 /var>temerity<var 1A 01 /var> to weep! “Please, my lord! Anything but that!”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003050_VAUTHRY<tab>Und dann fing er an zu weinen<var 1D /var>... „Verzeiht mir! Verzeiht mir!“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003060_VAUTHRY<tab>What then is a man of mercy to do, but offer the sinner another way to show his contrition?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003060_VAUTHRY<tab>Also habe ich ihm in meiner grenzenlosen Güte gestattet, seine Aufrichtigkeit auf andere Weise unter Beweis zu stellen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003070_ALPHINAUD<tab>"Another way“ meaning what, exactly!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was ist hier passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003080_VAUTHRY<tab>Sin eaters are part of Eulmore's society. But they must be fed with aether─<var 1A 02 /var>living<var 1A 01 /var> aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003080_VAUTHRY<tab>Unsere lieben Freunde, die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger, brauchen den Äther, aus dem die Körper aller Lebewesen bestehen. Er ist ihr Lebenssaft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003090_VAUTHRY<tab>So─I demanded an offering of flesh! Carved by his own hand, from his own hide!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003090_VAUTHRY<tab>„Gib ihm dein Fleisch! Schneid es aus deinem Körper, und gib ihm dein Fleisch! Auf dass er deine Sünde tilge.“ <var 1A 02 /var>Das<var 1A 01 /var> habe ich mit ihm gemacht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003100_VAUTHRY<tab>And still! <var 1A 02 /var>Still<var 1A 01 /var>, he could not do as I asked!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003100_VAUTHRY<tab>Aaaber! Der Nichtsnutz hat es nicht fertig gebracht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003110_VAUTHRY<tab>A wholly unsatisfactory performance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003110_VAUTHRY<tab>Er will nur haben, aber geben kann er nicht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003120_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis true that Kai-Shirr won his place here by fraud. But his actions were driven only by a desire to share in your paradise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Der Junge mag seine Verfehlungen haben. Aber er hat diese Stadt bewundert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003130_ALPHINAUD<tab>That you would cast him out I could almost accept, but to humiliate him thus? To demand his very <var 1A 02 /var>life<var 1A 01 /var>!? Is this truly the way of Eulmore!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Und was machen die Bürger von Eulmore? Sie danken es ihm mit Pein und Demütigung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003140_VAUTHRY<tab>Oh, you dim, deluded child... Have you ever paused to consider what it takes to maintain such a paradise in this barren, broken world of ours?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003140_VAUTHRY<tab>Was für ein lästiger Knirps<var 1D /var>... Glaubst du, so ein Paradies wie diese Stadt errichtet sich von selbst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003150_VAUTHRY<tab>The guarantee of safety and stability. The knowledge that if one only abides by the rules, one has naught to fear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003150_VAUTHRY<tab>Nein. Dazu bedarf es Stabilität, Sicherheit und einer eisernen Hand der Disziplin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003160_VAUTHRY<tab>I alone can offer these things, for I alone can command the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003160_VAUTHRY<tab>Das kann nur jemand bieten, der die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger in Schach hält: Ich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003170_VAUTHRY<tab>And thus am I alone the voice of justice─and any who oppose me villains to be punished!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003170_VAUTHRY<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> habe hier das Sagen. <var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> entscheide. Wer das nicht versteht, ist ein Feind unserer Ordnung und muss bekämpft werden! Sei die Verfehlung auch noch so klein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003180_ALPHINAUD<tab>And people call this paradise...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ein schönes Paradies ist das.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003190_VAUTHRY<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> were granted a place in my city for a particular skill. What was it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003190_VAUTHRY<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>... Sag mal<var 1D /var>... Wie bist du eigentlich hier reingekommen? Wofür hat man dich auserwählt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Painting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich soll ein Bild malen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003210_VAUTHRY<tab>Oho, an artiste! Then you shall paint a picture for me. Of Eulmore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003210_VAUTHRY<tab>Aha, ein Maler. Warum malst du dann nicht ein Bild von mir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003220_VAUTHRY<tab>If I find your art <var 1A 02 /var>pleasing<var 1A 01 /var>, then I may excuse this display of insolence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003220_VAUTHRY<tab>Wenn es mir gefällt, werde ich dir deine Verfehlung verzeihen. Vielleicht lass ich dich sogar in Eulmore wohnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003230_VAUTHRY<tab>Who gave you permission to tend to that criminal's wounds!? I told you to paint me a picture!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003230_VAUTHRY<tab>Was machst du da? Ich hab dir befohlen, ein Bild zu malen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003240_ALPHINAUD<tab>What you need is a mirror, not a painting. It will capture the horror I see before me far better than I ever could.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du brauchst kein Bild. Du brauchst einen Spiegel. Damit du einen langen, langen Blick auf deine hässliche Seele werfen kannst. Du Fettwanst!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003250_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you walk?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003250_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kannst du gehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003260_KAISHIRR<tab>I think so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003260_KAISHIRR<tab>Ah, aaah<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003270_VAUTHRY<tab>Did...did that little worm just insult me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003270_VAUTHRY<tab>Wie hat er mich genannt? Einen Fe... Einen Fe... Fe...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003280_VAUTHRY<tab>(TWO LONG SCREAMS)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003280_VAUTHRY<tab>AAAAAAAAAAAA! UAAAAAAAAAAA!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003290_VAUTHRY<tab>I─I─I'll kill them! I'll─I'll kill them all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003290_VAUTHRY<tab>Das verzeih ich ihm nie!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003300_VAUTHRY<tab>I'll enslave their minds! I'll─I'll torment them─torture them! Then tear out their hearts!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003300_VAUTHRY<tab>Ich mache ihn zu meinem Sklaven! Nein, beide! Ich werde sie quälen! Langsam und schmerzvoll sollen sie sterben! Uaaaaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Amh Araeng. From this parched earth the nation of Nabaath Areng once rose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003310_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Amh Araeng<var 1D /var>- inmitten dieser ausgedörrten Landmasse liegt das Land Nabaath Areng.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>When I journeyed here, long ago, I spoke with a sun-weathered elder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003320_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ein von der Sonne gegerbter Händler verriet mir auf einer meiner Reisen dort die Bedeutung des Namens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>He told me Amh Araeng meant “majestic land” in the language of his people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003330_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Amh Araeng<var 1D /var>... der gewaltige Kontinent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And so it might still be...were it not for the Light's unrelenting onslaught...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003340_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dann kam die Lichtflut und verschlang das Land. Übrig blieb ein Name, nicht mehr als Hohn und Spott.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was ist das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>So this is a Mord...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ein<var 1D /var>... Mordh?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>That's a kobold!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ein<var 1D /var>... Kobold!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>What beady eyes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Nicht viel zu sehen außer den Augen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003350_CASSARD<tab>Master Ghen Gen, this is the friend of the Exarch I was telling you about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003350_CASSARD<tab>Werter Ghen Gen. Das hier ist <var 08 E905 ((die Freundin)) ((der Freund)) /var> des Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen, von <var 08 E905 ((der)) ((dem)) /var> ich sprach.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003360_GHENGEN<tab>Very good, very good! Though friend or no, all are welcome in Mord Souq.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003360_GHENGEN<tab>Willkommen in Mordh Souq. Hier hat alles Wert, alles!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003370_CASSARD<tab>"Souq“ is Mordish for ”city.“ As things stand, this souq boasts the largest and busiest marketplace in all Amh Araeng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003370_CASSARD<tab>Mordh Souq bedeutet so viel wie der „Marktplatz der Mordh“. Und er rühmt sich, der größte und bestbesuchte Markt in ganz Amh Araeng zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003380_CASSARD<tab>You'll find ore from the mines here, of course, but all manner of other things too─many of them rare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003380_CASSARD<tab>Hier wird alles gehandelt. Natürlich die Erze aus den nahegelegenen Minen, aber auch alle Arten von anderen Artikeln<var 1D /var>- darunter skurrile und seltene, die man sonst nirgendwo findet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003390_CASSARD<tab>As I told you before, not many visit Amh Araeng by choice, but Mord Souq's a different story. Merchants come from malms around to purchase the relics the Mord dig up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003390_CASSARD<tab>Kaum jemand kommt freiwillig nach Amh Araeng, aber dieser Markt ist eine Ausnahme. Händler kommen von überall her, auf der Suche nach Raritäten und Sammlerstücken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003400_GHENGEN<tab>Aye, that they do, for Mord do not dismiss the spoils of the earth. We clean them and polish them and reveal to the world their true value!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003400_GHENGEN<tab>Dinge zu kaufen gibt's überall. Nützliche Dinge. Interessante Dinge! Aber das Beste, nur hier. Nur hier!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003410_GHENGEN<tab>That is why they come here! Come from far away! Come with much money!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003410_GHENGEN<tab>Hast auch Geld in der Tasche? Wie alle Reisenden von weit weg? Zum Markt, da müssen wir hin!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003420_GHENGEN<tab>And so our souq is always busy, busy, busy! No such thing as a thing no one needs!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003420_GHENGEN<tab>Das wird was! Das gibt ein Spaß! Kauf ein, kauf ein. Kann alles brauchen. Alles auf der Welt kann man irgendwann gebrauchen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003430_CASSARD<tab>You say that every time, Master Ghen Gen! Some sort of family motto, wasn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003430_CASSARD<tab>Ha ha ha. Das höre ich dich immer wieder sagen, werter Ghen Gen. Ist das eine Weisheit deiner Ahnen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003440_CASSARD<tab>Or perhaps a Mord philosophy─for which we should all be very grateful. Would that everyone was so willing to take in refugees regardless of race or creed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003440_CASSARD<tab>Na, es ist jedenfalls eine gute Einstellung. Das ist wohl auch der Grund, warum es euch so leicht fällt, Vertriebene bei euch aufzunehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003450_CASSARD<tab>Now, then─if you intend to spend any time here, you'll want to gain the trust of the locals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003450_CASSARD<tab>Wenn du vorhast, länger in Amh Araeng zu bleiben, tätest du gut daran, dich mit den Bewohnern dieser Siedlung anzufreunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003460_CASSARD<tab>And there's a little custom all newcomers are expected to observe...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003460_CASSARD<tab>Sie haben ein<var 1D /var>... Begrüßungsritual für Neuankömmlinge, aber<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003470_GHENGEN<tab>The cracking of the coinpurse! You buy one thing from the market. Price can be low or high, just as long as you buy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003470_GHENGEN<tab>Ja, genau, genau! Erstkauf, wichtigster Kauf! Musst einfach kaufen. Macht so jeder Neuling auf dem Markt. Groß, klein, teuer, billig<var 1D /var>... Egal! Egal!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003480_CASSARD<tab>...As the good Mord says. In fact, the Exarch sent a little something to cover this very expense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003480_CASSARD<tab>Ehrlich gesagt wusste ich, dass es dazu kommen würde. Und der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch auch. Deswegen hat er dir das hier geschickt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003490_CASSARD<tab>A Voeburt gold piece, no less! The first I've held in years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003490_CASSARD<tab>Na, da schau her! 'ne Münze aus Voeburt! Ist 'ne Weile her, dass die mir untergekommen sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003500_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Voeburt gold!? <var 1A 02 /var>Real<var 1A 01 /var> Voeburt gold!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003500_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Was sagst du? Was hör ich da? Münze? Münze aus Voeburt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003510_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Here, newcomer! Crack your coinpurse with me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003510_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Mach deinen Erstkauf bei mir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003520_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>No, no, you want my goods, newcomer! I have jars and pots, all smooth and shiny!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003520_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>Nein, nein, nein! Nur bei mir! Töpfe schön. Glatt und glänzend!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003530_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Over here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003530_MORDMERCHANTA<tab>Hergekommen! Her zu mir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003540_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Come and look!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003540_MORDMERCHANTB<tab>Bei mir! Bei mir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003550_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>You buy! You buy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003550_MORDMERCHANTC<tab>Bester Kauf bei mir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003560_GHENGEN<tab>Enough of that! Calm, I say!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003560_GHENGEN<tab>Ruhig! Mäuler zu und Ohren auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003570_GHENGEN<tab>This one must still journey through the barrens. Nothing bulky! Nothing heavy! No <var 1A 02 /var>pots<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003570_GHENGEN<tab><var 08 E905 ((Neue)) ((Neuer)) /var> will reisen. Und Reise wird lang. Will keinen sperrigen Krempel!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003580_GHENGEN<tab>Nothing better for the road than a full belly. Spend that piece at Rhon Ron's place, yes? Eat for three before you leave!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003580_GHENGEN<tab>Ruhe brauchst du. Ruhe und Kraft. Ich weiß, ich weiß! Erstkauf bei Rhon Ron, Erstkauf ist gut. Viele leckere Sachen, machen dich stark für Reise!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003590_ALISAIE<tab>(-???-)Get back here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003590_ALISAIE<tab>(-???-)Hiergeblieben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003600_ALISAIE<tab>Is that!? It can't be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003600_ALISAIE<tab>Ha! Bist du es wirklich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003610_ALISAIE<tab>Hah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003610_ALISAIE<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Impressive!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sauberer Stoß.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You almost lost that one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Das war ganz schön brenzlig<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003620_ALISAIE<tab>Just a lesser sin eater. Nothing to write home about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003620_ALISAIE<tab>Das war nur einer von den kleinen. Die halten nicht viel aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003630_ALISAIE<tab>I had it under control! ...Right up until the moment I didn't. I'll do better next time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003630_ALISAIE<tab>Das weiß ich selber. Ich<var 1D /var>... war halt abgelenkt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003640_ALISAIE<tab>I knew you'd turn up sooner or later, but I had been hoping for <var 1A 02 /var>sooner<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003640_ALISAIE<tab>Ich habe immer gewusst, dass du kommen würdest. Aber musstest du dir so viel Zeit lassen<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003650_ALISAIE<tab>How are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003650_ALISAIE<tab>Endlich bist du da! Wie geht es dir?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003660_ALISAIE<tab>We've fought them to a standstill, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003660_ALISAIE<tab>Ich hab mir viele Sorgen wegen des Krieges gemacht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003670_ALISAIE<tab>The Exarch did say that the Empire seemed to have drawn back when he last looked in on the Source. But without knowing for sure how fast time was passing there, I couldn't help worrying that a lot might have happened since then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003670_ALISAIE<tab>Von dem Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen hab ich gehört, dass die größte Gefahr vorbei sei. Aber wer weiß, was alles passieren kann, wenn die Zeit so verrückt spielt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003680_ALISAIE<tab>I'm heartily relieved to hear that it hasn't─just as Alphinaud must have been. As you can imagine, both he and Urianger were desperate to hear the news from home when I arrived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003680_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud und Urianger habe ich nach meiner Ankunft hier getroffen. Ich hab ihnen alles erzählt, was ich weiß.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003690_ALISAIE<tab>I haven't actually seen Thancred and Y'shtola yet, but they will have heard all the latest developments from the Exarch by now─or should have, at least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003690_ALISAIE<tab>Thancred und Y'shtola sind mir noch nicht begegnet, aber sie stehen mit dem Exarchen in Kontakt. Sie sollten über das Wichtigste informiert sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003700_ALISAIE<tab>When I think of how frantic Tataru and the others must be, I want nothing more than to rush back and reassure them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003700_ALISAIE<tab>Wenn ich an Tataru und die anderen denke, möchte ich so schnell wie möglich wieder nach Hause zurückkehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003710_ALISAIE<tab>But we still haven't found a way to reverse the summoning. And even if we had, we couldn't just ignore Urianger's vision.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003710_ALISAIE<tab>Aber wir wissen nicht wie. Außerdem kann ich nicht vergessen, was Urianger gesehen hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003720_ALISAIE<tab>He may use ten words where one would suffice─and they may often obscure as much as they reveal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003720_ALISAIE<tab>Du weißt ja, wie er ist<var 1D /var>... Er sagt selten etwas geradeheraus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003730_ALISAIE<tab>But on this matter, he was as clear as day. I do not doubt for one moment that he saw what he claims.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003730_ALISAIE<tab>Aber er hat ein großes Herz und würde uns niemals in die Irre führen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003740_ALISAIE<tab>Nor how difficult it must have been to speak about them. The Eighth Umbral Calamity and your death aren't exactly topics for idle conversation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003740_ALISAIE<tab>Dass er die Achte Katastrophe gesehen hat<var 1D /var>... und deinen Tod<var 1D /var>... Er hätte das alles nie erzählt, wenn er nicht davon überzeugt wäre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003750_ALISAIE<tab>As much as I might want to go home, I don't want to go home to that. We can't allow the Rejoining to happen, which means we have to save the First from the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003750_ALISAIE<tab>Es gibt jetzt nichts Wichtigeres mehr, als die Vereinigung der Welten aufzuhalten. Und dazu müssen wir diese Welt von den Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgern befreien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003760_ALISAIE<tab>That great wall of white is a remnant of the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003760_ALISAIE<tab>Sieh dir diese weiße Wand an. Sie ist ein Überbleibsel der Lichtflut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003770_ALISAIE<tab>A hundred years ago, the balance in the First tipped decisively in favor of Light. From that moment, it rose and swelled with each passing day─and then, without warning, it burst forth like water from a broken dam.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003770_ALISAIE<tab>Vor einhundert Jahren nahm das Licht in der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt überhand. Die Welt geriet aus dem Gleichgewicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003780_ALISAIE<tab>...A colossal wave of pure Light, drowning everything in its wake. Only Norvrandt was spared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003780_ALISAIE<tab>Was folgte war eine gewaltige Lichtwelle, die fast die ganze Welt verschluckte. Übrig blieb nur Norvrandt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003790_ALISAIE<tab>For the most part, living things are composed of aether of various different aspects.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003790_ALISAIE<tab>Normalerweise trägt jedes Lebewesen Äther in sich, der aus mehreren Elementaraspekten besteht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003800_ALISAIE<tab>But when exposed to such a flood, their aetheric harmony is shattered, and their natural form breaks down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003800_ALISAIE<tab>Doch die Lichtwelle spülte die anderen Aspekte fort, wusch sie weg, und das Leben<var 1D /var>... verlor die Kraft, seine Form zu behalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003810_ALISAIE<tab>Then they either perish...or are warped into mindless abominations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003810_ALISAIE<tab>Die Folge war ein großes Sterben<var 1D /var>... Und was nicht starb, verwandelte sich<var 1D /var>- in etwas Monströses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003820_ALISAIE<tab>Yes, that's how the sin eaters came to be. They were once living creatures─or people─that were caught in the path of the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003820_ALISAIE<tab>Ja. Die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger sind eigentlich Leute wie du und ich, die von den Fluten des Lichts verschluckt wurden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003830_ALISAIE<tab>Once the change is wrought, there is no going back. In that instant, they are gripped by an insatiable appetite for aether, and will happily gorge themselves on any living thing within reach.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003830_ALISAIE<tab>Für sie gibt es keinen Weg zurück. Jetzt stürzen sie sich auf alles, was Äther hat und fressen es auf. Für sie sind wir nichts als Futter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003840_ALISAIE<tab>But even that is not the worst of it. The stronger sin eaters can plant Light in us like seeds in soil, corrupting our aether, and triggering the birth of new monstrosities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003840_ALISAIE<tab>Oder ihre Brut. Denn die stärkeren unter ihnen können den Äther ihres Opfers so verderben, dass es selbst zu einem Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003850_ALISAIE<tab>They are creatures of base instinct that exist only to feed and to multiply. They feel no pity, know no remorse, and are utterly deaf to reason. Which is why they must be destroyed. Every last one of them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003850_ALISAIE<tab>Fressen und vermehren, etwas anderes kennen sie nicht. Deswegen werden wir nie mit ihnen in Frieden zusammenleben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003860_ALISAIE<tab>The infirmary is full of the sin eaters' victims, left here to spend their final hours waiting for the change to overtake them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003860_ALISAIE<tab>Um die verlorenen Seelen, die Verstoßenen, die sich bald verwandeln werden, kümmern wir uns hier. In der Ruhstatt vor der Langen Reise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003870_ALISAIE<tab>Look, over there─where the wall is broken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003870_ALISAIE<tab>Sieh mal dort, der Spalt in dem Kristall.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003880_ALISAIE<tab>Do you see what lies beyond?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003880_ALISAIE<tab>Siehst du die weiße Ebene dahinter?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>That's what the land became after the Light flooded in. An empty white nothingness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003890_ALISAIE<tab>Das ist das Land, das von der Lichtflut verschluckt wurde. Es ist ein Nichts, ein leeres, weißes Nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003900_ALISAIE<tab>Life cannot exist in such conditions. The primordial Light would wreak havoc on the body's aetheric balance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003900_ALISAIE<tab>Wenn man es betritt, wird der Körperäther sofort von der Gewalt des Lichts verdorben. Nichts kann dort leben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003910_ALISAIE<tab>That nectarine you bought...it's Halric's favorite fruit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003910_ALISAIE<tab>Halric<var 1D /var>... Der Junge, der sich verwandelt<var 1D /var>... Er isst nichts lieber als Nektarinen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003920_ALISAIE<tab>Most of the patients, Halric included, survived the attacks of powerful eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003920_ALISAIE<tab>Er hat den Angriff eines Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgers überlebt. Er hat um sein Leben gekämpft und tapfer alle Schmerzen ertragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003930_ALISAIE<tab>But their fate was sealed all the same. The monsters' corruption has entered their bodies, and their very essence is being subsumed by Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003930_ALISAIE<tab>Doch kein Mut hilft gegen die tödliche Saat, die der Feind bereits in seinen Körper gelegt hatte. Die Vergiftung seines Äthers ist nicht aufzuhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003940_ALISAIE<tab>The twisted state of the world itself just makes matters worse. Under normal circumstances, a person's aether naturally tends to equilibrium, but for these poor souls, the opposite is true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003940_ALISAIE<tab>Wer gesund ist, dessen Äther kann sich auf natürliche Weise wieder einrichten. Aber bei ihnen, in dieser Umgebung, sammelt sich einfach nur immer mehr Licht an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003950_ALISAIE<tab>Sooner or later, every single one of them will turn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003950_ALISAIE<tab>Früher oder später werden sie alle zu Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen and the patients, they all know this. They know what has to be done before the change goes too far─before the eater within takes over.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen und die anderen wissen das. Sie sind bereit, das Leiden zu beenden, bevor die Verwandlung abgeschlossen ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003970_ALISAIE<tab>The preferred method is mixing poison into their favorite food. In my time here, I've borne witness to a lot of last meals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003970_ALISAIE<tab>Ein letzter Akt der Gnade. Eine Prise Gift in der letzten Mahlzeit. So endet es jedes Mal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003980_ALISAIE<tab>I feel just as helpless as before. No matter how hard I fight, it's never enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003980_ALISAIE<tab>Es ist so schrecklich traurig. Wir kämpfen und kämpfen, aber es ist nicht genug.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003990_ALISAIE<tab>But it's a war I mean to wage, nonetheless. ...Speaking of wars, do you remember how I made you promise not to leave me, and then promptly collapsed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_003990_ALISAIE<tab>Weißt du noch, wie ich dich gebeten habe, mich nicht alleine zu lassen? Kurz darauf bin ich verschwunden, und ließ dich alleine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004000_ALISAIE<tab>Well, let's just say I had a few choice words for the Exarch concerning the timing of his summons...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004000_ALISAIE<tab>Warum musste er mich auch ausgerechnet dann rufen? Ich hab dem Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen mehr als einmal gesagt, was ich davon hielt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004010_ALISAIE<tab>But even if the fault lay with someone else, I couldn't shake the feeling that I'd abandoned you on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004010_ALISAIE<tab>Es tat mir so leid, dass ich dir auf dem Schlachtfeld nicht beigestanden habe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004020_ALISAIE<tab>So I swore that I'd make up for my absence there by making a difference here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004020_ALISAIE<tab>Ich schwor mir, wenigstens hier nach besten Kräften zu helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004030_ALISAIE<tab>And that's what keeps me moving forward...even when things seem hopeless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004030_ALISAIE<tab>Egal, wie schwer es auch sein mag.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004040_ALISAIE<tab>On which note, it's time we headed back. The longer we keep Tesleen waiting, the harder this will be for her...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004040_ALISAIE<tab>Lass uns zurückgehen. Ich habe Tesleen schon lang genug mit der Arbeit allein gelassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004050_TESLEEN<tab>Speak up if you'd like another helping. I made a little bit more than usual today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004050_TESLEEN<tab>Ich hab etwas mehr gemacht als sonst. Sagt, wenn es nicht genug ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004060_ALISAIE<tab>And you've added something special to the broth, if I'm not mistaken?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004060_ALISAIE<tab>Bild ich mir das ein oder ist da auch mehr Gemüse drin als sonst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004070_TESLEEN<tab>Aye, well, it's not often we have visitors from the Crystarium, so I may have thrown in a few extra bits and bobs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004070_TESLEEN<tab>Du bildest dir es nicht ein. Ich dachte, für einen Gast aus Crystarium kann es ruhig mal etwas Besonderes sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You needn't have gone to the trouble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Das wäre doch nicht nötig gewesen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll have another bowl, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Dann nehm ich gleich noch mal nach!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004080_TESLEEN<tab>Oh, it's nothing, really! And we do so rarely have guests.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004080_TESLEEN<tab>Das ist doch selbst<var 16 /var>verständ<var 16 /var>lich! Wir freuen uns über jeden Besucher. Es kommen ja nicht so viele.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004090_TESLEEN<tab>That's what I like to hear! Give me a moment to warm up the pot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004090_TESLEEN<tab>Aber gerne doch! Ich freu mich, wenn's schmeckt. Kannst du dich noch etwas gedulden? Die nächste Portion muss noch ein wenig köcheln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004100_TESLEEN<tab>In a place like this, you learn to take what moments of happiness you can get.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004100_TESLEEN<tab>Weißt du<var 1D /var>... Ich koche nur selten für Leute, die freiwillig hier sind. Die meisten wurden verstoßen und kommen, um zu sterben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004110_TESLEEN<tab>I remember when I first came here with my mother. She was showing the early signs...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004110_TESLEEN<tab>Ich habe meine Mutter hierhergebracht. Alleine hätte sie es nicht mehr geschafft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004120_TESLEEN<tab>I knew there was no way to save her, but I just couldn't face what needed to be done. That's the way of it for most people─why they travel for malms to stay here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004120_TESLEEN<tab>Wir können keinen heilen. Wir können sie nur bis zum Ende begleiten. Und ihnen den letzten Teil der Reise<var 1D /var>... etwas leichter machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004130_TESLEEN<tab>Beaten, broken souls come to wait out the inevitable. To receive the mercy of a painless death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004130_TESLEEN<tab>Dies ist kein Ort der Hoffnung. Es ist ein Ort des Abschieds<var 1D /var>... und der Würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004140_TESLEEN<tab>When my mother finally left this world, I was mad with grief, but also thankful that her passing was a peaceful one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004140_TESLEEN<tab>Als meine Mutter ihren letzten Atemzug tat, habe ich vor allem eins empfunden: Dankbarkeit für den Frieden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004150_TESLEEN<tab>It's never easy, ending a life you've cared for. Even when you believe they go on to a better place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004150_TESLEEN<tab>Ja, seine Zeit ist gekommen. Wenn es doch nur leichter wäre, die Hand derer loszulassen, die man schon so lange begleitet hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004160_TESLEEN<tab>I often find myself wishing the Warrior of Darkness would come and do that part for me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004160_TESLEEN<tab>Dann wünsche ich mir jedes Mal, dass der Krieger der Dunkelheit endlich erscheint und all dem ein Ende macht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004170_ALISAIE<tab>The Warrior of Darkness...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004170_ALISAIE<tab>Der Krieger der Dunkelheit?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004180_TESLEEN<tab>You've never heard the tale? I'm not sure where it began, but every child in Norvrandt could tell you a version of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004180_TESLEEN<tab>Ja, weißt du das denn nicht? So genau kenn ich mich auch nicht aus, aber es gibt doch diese alte Überlieferung.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004190_TESLEEN<tab>"Warrior of Darkness, servant of death,
take care of our souls at our dying breath...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004190_TESLEEN<tab>„Ein Krieger des Dunkels bringt mit Schwert und Speer
nicht Tod, sondern Erlösung.
Das Leben, das von ihm beendet,
kehrt heim ins dunkle Himmelsmeer.“

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004200_TESLEEN<tab>“Let sinners and eaters of sin go with thee,
That all may return to the sunless sea.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004200_TESLEEN<tab>„Lass niemand' ziehn! Lass keinen fliehn!
Ob gute Seel' oder verwandelter Vertilger!“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004210_TESLEEN<tab>...Well, that's the version I was taught anyway. It's just an old bedtime story─he's certainly never deigned to visit us here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004210_TESLEEN<tab>Ich glaub, so ging ein Teil des Gedichts. Gesehen habe ich so einen Krieger natürlich noch nicht. Wahrscheinlich ist es nur ein Märchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004220_ALISAIE<tab>Which is a good thing, surely? He sounds rather ominous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004220_ALISAIE<tab>Wer weiß, vielleicht ist da ja was dran?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004230_TESLEEN<tab>Do you think so? I always liked the idea that he treated every soul the same, even the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004230_TESLEEN<tab>Glaubst du? Ich mochte das Gedicht immer, weil der Krieger der Dunkelheit darin allen, uns und den Vertilgern, das Leben zurückgibt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004240_JOURNEYSHEADPATIENT<tab>They're coming...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004240_JOURNEYSHEADPATIENT<tab>Er kommt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004250_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Tesleen!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004250_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Tesleen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004260_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Have you seen Halric!? I swear, I only took my eyes off him for a moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004260_JOURNEYSHEADNURSE<tab>Halric ist verschwunden! Dabei habe ich ihn nur ganz kurz aus den Augen gelassen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004270_ALISAIE<tab>Any sign of him!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004270_ALISAIE<tab>Und? Hast du was gefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004280_ALISAIE<tab>No luck, then. But he surely can't have gone far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004280_ALISAIE<tab>Ich hab auch keine Spur. So weit kann er doch gar nicht sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004290_ALISAIE<tab>We should keep looking. The sin eaters are out in force, and if we don't find him soon, you can be sure they will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004290_ALISAIE<tab>Hoffentlich haben die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger nichts damit zu tun. Komm, wir suchen weiter!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004300_ALISAIE<tab>Did you see the size of that thing? It must be one of the nasty ones.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004300_ALISAIE<tab>Da ist einer! Und zwar ein ganz großer!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>Wherever it's going, it can only mean trouble. After it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004310_ALISAIE<tab>Er ist auf der Jagd. Schnell, hinterher!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004320_ALISAIE<tab>There it is!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004320_ALISAIE<tab>Da! Da ist er!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004330_ALISAIE<tab>Is that─ Oh...oh no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004330_ALISAIE<tab>Nein!<var 1D /var>... Bitte nicht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004340_ALISAIE<tab>Halric!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004340_ALISAIE<tab>Halric!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004350_TESLEEN<tab>We have to run!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004350_TESLEEN<tab>Renn! Renn weg!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004360_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen, no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004360_ALISAIE<tab>Tesleen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004370_TESLEEN<tab>We all deserve happiness...wherever we can find it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004370_TESLEEN<tab>In dieser Welt gibt es nichts<var 1D /var>... was man nicht braucht!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004380_TESLEEN<tab>The time left to you...is precious... No one should die...in pain...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004380_TESLEEN<tab>Nutze deine Zeit<var 1D /var>... bis zu allerletzt<var 1D /var>... Stirb<var 1D /var>... in Frieden<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004390_TESLEEN<tab>Mother...Mother, I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004390_TESLEEN<tab>So ist es doch<var 1D /var>... Mutter...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004400_TESLEEN<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004400_TESLEEN<tab>Aaa<var 1D /var>... Uaa<var 1D /var>... Aaa!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004410_TESLEEN<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004410_TESLEEN<tab>Aaaaaa!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004411_TESLEEN<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004411_TESLEEN<tab>Uarrr<var 1D /var>... nggg<var 1D /var>... nfff<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Oh no, no... No, no, no, no, no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Nein<var 1D /var>... Tesleen<var 1D /var>... Nein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004430_TESLEEN<tab>Forgive me...Alisaie...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004430_TESLEEN<tab>Verzeih mir<var 1D /var>... Alisaie<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so you return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es ist gut, euch wiederzusehen. Alle drei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Have you gained a better understanding of the crisis now faced by the First?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Versteht ihr jetzt, in welchem Zustand sich diese Welt befindet?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004460_ALISAIE<tab>"Better“ is not the word I would use.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004460_ALISAIE<tab>Ja. Wir haben alles gesehen, mit eigenen Augen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004470_ALISAIE<tab>Some lands may have been spared the Flood, but the survivors live only to suffer. There seems no end to the horrors inflicted by the sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004470_ALISAIE<tab>Die Lichtflut hat fast das ganze Land verschlungen. Und die Überlebenden werden von den Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgern dahingerafft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed. Those abominations are a calamity in their own right. And I can well imagine how hopeless the task of eradicating them must seem to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, der Kampf gegen sie scheint in der Tat aussichtslos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But after countless battles and untold sacrifice, we have identified a potential weakness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber es gibt eine Möglichkeit, die Chancen zu unseren Gunsten zu verbessern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sin eaters are drawn to serve the strongest of their kind─a class of creature we call “Lightwardens.” And from what we have been able to ascertain, only a handful of these entities exist.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich habe erkannt, dass die großen Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger die kleineren zusammenhalten, so wie man es bei bestimmten Insektenvölkern beobachtet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Just as an ant colony will perish in the absence of its queen, we believe that the death of a Lightwarden will cause the lesser creatures within its sphere of influence to disperse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn man also einen großen besiegt, sind die anderen nicht mehr in der Lage, sinnvoll zusammenzuarbeiten. Sie geben auf und verlassen ihr Areal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004520_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have a feeling Eulmore might have something to say about any concerted action we take against these monsters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hm<var 1D /var>... Wie wird Eulmore reagieren, wenn wir Jagd auf die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger machen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vauthry's command over the sin eaters is integral to Eulmoran society. In seeming to guarantee his people's safety, it guarantees their obedience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vauthry bezieht seine Autorität hauptsächlich daraus, dass er diese Scheusale kontrolliert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004540_ALPHINAUD<tab>He will not take kindly to us depriving him of such useful allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wenn wir nun daherkommen und die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger beseitigen, wird er darüber sicher nicht erfreut sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Agreed. Thus we will need to occupy or otherwise divert his forces whilst we proceed with the business of eliminating the Wardens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es führt kein Weg daran vorbei. Um Vauthrys Einfluss über Eulmore zu brechen, müssen die großen Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger ausgerottet werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Until we have done so, all other considerations must be set aside if we are to forestall the Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das ist mein Ziel. Und eures, wenn ihr die Achte Katastrophe verhindern wollt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you sure that eliminating the Wardens will be enough?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Können wir so wirklich die Katastrophe abwenden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm not sure I follow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Irgendwie will mir das alles noch nicht so richtig einleuchten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your uncertainty is understandable, given the circumstances. Perhaps a more detailed explanation is in order. To begin at the beginning, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 1D /var>... Gut. Ich werde es euch erklären. Aber seht mir nach, wenn meine Ausführungen etwas länger dauern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the ancient past, a single star was divided into fourteen worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vor langer Zeit zersplitterte die Welt in vierzehn Teile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This is the Source─your home. These others are the thirteen shards, in whose number we find the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt, aus der ihr kommt, und dreizehn Splitter<var 16 /var>welten, von denen diese Welt eine ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though physically separate, they retain a connection to each other, and with the Source especially.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Welten sind voneinander getrennt, vermögen sich aber zu beeinflussen. Das gilt besonders für die Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt, aus der alle Welten gekommen sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now, let us assume that a given element in one of the shards attains abnormal ascendancy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nehmen wir nun einmal an, dass in einer Splitter<var 16 /var>welt eine der Elementar<var 16 /var>kräfte anormal stark ansteigt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Just as water will flow from the highest point to the lowest, the excess energy will begin trickling into the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So wie Wasser von einem höher gelegenen Punkt aus nach unten fließt, strömt diese übermäßige Elementar<var 16 /var>kraft von der Splitter<var 16 /var>welt in den Ursprung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And such an influx of aether will of course exert a palpable influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das hat dort natürlich verheerende Auswirkungen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If the element in question were fire, then drought and wild fires might ensue. If it were ice, one might expect the weather to turn bitterly cold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das Feuerelement zum Beispiel kann große Feuersbrünste oder extreme Dürren auslösen. Eis führt zu einer bitteren Kälteperiode. Und so weiter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As aether continues to pour in, such phenomena will become more and more extreme, until eventually, a single untimely event triggers a disaster which “cracks” the barrier dividing the two worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Das Gleichgewicht des Ursprungs wird geschwächt, und dann kann ein anderes Unheil<var 1D /var>- gefährlich, aber für sich genommen keine welten<var 16 /var>zerstörende Bedrohung<var 1D /var>- zu einem Riss in der Wand führen, welche die Welten voneinander trennt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>What was once a trickle now becomes a deluge, sweeping the shard along to be rejoined with the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dann kennt der Fluss der Energie kein Halten mehr. Der Splitter vereint sich mit dem Ursprung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At the same time, the element which held sway in the shard is unleashed in full, its energies amplifying the original disaster to truly catastrophic proportions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die übermäßige Elementar<var 16 /var>energie, die der Splitter<var 16 /var>welt innewohnte, fließt dabei komplett in die Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt und verstärkt dort mit einem Mal das Unheil, das den Riss verursacht hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>An earthquake thus magnified might strike with enough force to shatter continents; a tidal wave might swell to a size capable of drowning entire nations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Erdelementare Energie erzeugt Beben von solcher Gewalt, dass sie den Erdmantel selbst zum Bersten bringen. Wasserenergie lässt Tsunamiwellen zu Sintfluten anschwellen, die ganze Kontinente verschlucken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>These devastating events are what we refer to as “Umbral Calamities.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dies sind die Katastrophen, welche das Angesicht des Ursprungs vollkommen verwandeln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Seven times has a calamity befallen the Source; seven times has a shard been absorbed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bisher sind sieben Splitter<var 16 /var>welten mit dem Ursprung vereint, wodurch sieben Katastrophen über ihn hinwegfegten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At present, the Light-drowned realm of the First stands perilously close to meeting the conditions for a Rejoining.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und nun ist der erste Splitter mit derart viel lichtelementarer Energie geflutet, dass die Voraus<var 16 /var>setzungen für eine neue Verschmelzung gegeben sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It is the sin eaters who are to blame for the Light's continued dominance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Der Grund für die unnatürliche Ansammlung des Lichts sind die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In addition to attracting their lesser kin, the Lightwardens I mentioned earlier radiate aether, saturating every corner of their territory with Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Jeder der großen, von denen ich eben gesprochen habe, herrscht über ein Territorium und verbreitet dort ein gleißendes Licht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Even here in the Flood-spared region of Norvrandt, their influence is strong enough to banish night from the sky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie sind es, die Norvrandt, das der Lichtflut nur knapp entkam, die Dunkelheit raubten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thus, if we are to restore balance to the First and head off a potential calamity, it is imperative that we put each and every Lightwarden to the sword.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Um das Gleichgewicht des ersten Splitters wie<var 16 /var>der<var 16 /var>her<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>stel<var 16 /var>len und die Vereinigung aufzuhalten, müssen diese „Licht<var 16 /var>bringer“ beseitigt werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004760_ALISAIE<tab>We've been doing our best to take the fight to the enemy ever since we first heard the Exarch's explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004760_ALISAIE<tab>Mein Bruder und ich haben uns schon den Kopf darüber zerbrochen, wie man ihnen beikommen kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though we have yet to claim any meaningful victories, if truth be told.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>... bisher ohne Erfolg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Apart from being confoundingly elusive, the Lightwardens possess a troublesome quality which compelled us to delay our plans until such time as you arrived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Licht<var 16 /var>bringer lassen sich nicht oft blicken, und außerdem sind sie mächtige Gegner. Uns blieb nichts anderes übrig, als auf dich zu warten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004790_LYNA<tab>Forgive the interruption, my lord, but Holminster Switch is requesting reinforcements!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004790_LYNA<tab>Entschuldigt die Störung, Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch! Ich habe eine dringende Meldung!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004800_LYNA<tab>They say the sin eaters are attacking in force, and the village could soon be overrun.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004800_LYNA<tab>Holminster wurde von den Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilgern überfallen. Es sind mehr als sonst! Der Bote befürchtet, dass das Dorf komplett ausgelöscht werden könnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Alert the guard. We should be prepared in case the fighting reaches the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger bei Holminster sind, können sie auch Crystarium erreichen. Schließt die Tore und verstärkt die Wachen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You have command of our forces in the field, Captain, but hold off on entering the town until I arrive. That goes for Alphinaud and Alisaie as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eile zurück zum Dorf und beobachte die Situation. Aber betritt es nicht, bis ich da bin. Sag das auch den Zwillingen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004830_LYNA<tab>My lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004830_LYNA<tab>Zu Befehl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pray, lend us your strength. Such a fight will provide you with far greater insight than any explanation I could offer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Jetzt wird sich zeigen, wozu du fähig bist. Komm, die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger warten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004850_LYNA<tab>It's releasing its aether. Fall back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004850_LYNA<tab>Verdammt! Das Licht breitet sich aus!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004860_LYNA<tab>We cannot let it touch us. Quickly, my lord, we must withdraw!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004860_LYNA<tab>Wir dürfen nicht damit in Berührung kommen. Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch, befehlt den Rückzug!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That will not be necessary, Captain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004870_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nein. Diesmal nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Though I appreciate your concern. The eternal Light of these creatures has confounded us for nigh on a hundred years. For each we have put down, another has risen up in its place, born of the selfsame aether relinquished by its predecessor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn ein Licht<var 16 /var>bringer im Kampf fällt, wird sein gesamtes Licht auf einmal freigesetzt und ein neuer Licht<var 16 /var>bringer wird geboren. Deswegen hatten wir ihnen in den letzten hundert Jahren nichts entgegenzusetzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But now we have a way to contain that corruption.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber diesmal können wir seine Kraft kompensieren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The blessing of Light! And the hero who wields it now stands before you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mit der Gnade des Lichts! Deswegen habe ich ihn in diese Welt gerufen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The blessing of Light! And the hero who wields it now stands before you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mit der Gnade des Lichts! Deswegen habe ich sie in diese Welt gerufen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Behold! The monster's power is broken! And the world twisted by its touch returns to its rightful form!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Da! Das Licht schwindet! Die Dunkelheit kehrt zurück! Die Kraft des Licht<var 16 /var>bringers ist gebrochen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004930_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>The sky!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004930_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>Seht nur!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004940_CRYSTARIUMWOMAN<tab>It can't be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004940_CRYSTARIUMWOMAN<tab>Der Himmel<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004950_CRYSTARIUMOLDMAN<tab>What's happening...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004950_CRYSTARIUMOLDMAN<tab>Wie ist das möglich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004960_CRYSTARIUMGIRL<tab>It's so beautiful...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004960_CRYSTARIUMGIRL<tab>Es ist<var 1D /var>... wunderschön!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004970_MOREN<tab>The sunless sea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004970_MOREN<tab>Das dunkle Himmelsmeer<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004980_MOREN<tab>The Warrior of Darkness has come!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004980_MOREN<tab>Der Krieger der Dunkelheit ist gekommen<var 1D /var>... um uns zu retten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004990_LYNA<tab>Is that...what I think it is?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_004990_LYNA<tab>Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass der Himmel so schön sein kann<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005000_ALPHINAUD<tab>The night sky, as it should be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es ist der Nachthimmel. Die Dunkelheit ist zurück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005010_LYNA<tab>Who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005010_LYNA<tab>Wer seid ihr? Und woher kommt ihr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005020_LYNA<tab>You killed a Warden, then bathed in its aether as if it were a spring shower, and now the sky...? The legends are true!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005020_LYNA<tab>Du hast den Licht<var 16 /var>bringer besiegt, und sein Licht konnte dir nichts anhaben. Und der Himmel<var 1D /var>... Es ist wie in der Überlieferung!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005030_LYNA<tab>My lord...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005030_LYNA<tab>Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>How many years have I waited for this moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wie viele Jahre habe ich gewartet<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For the one possessed of Her blessing. For you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Auf <var 08 E905 ((die, die)) ((den, der)) /var> die Gnade des Lichts in sich trägt. Auf dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You have vanquished the Lightwarden of Lakeland, and for the first time in a century darkness has returned to the mantle of night.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du hast den Licht<var 16 /var>bringer im Seenland bezwungen und der Region die Dunkelheit zurückgebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Without the ever-present Light to sustain them, the sin eaters will have no choice but to retreat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die niederen Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger werden sich bald verzogen haben. Das Land ist wieder sicher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Yet our victory is far from complete.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber es gibt noch andere Licht<var 16 /var>bringer. Andere Regionen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though darkness has fallen here, the other Wardens yet bask beneath burning skies, feasting upon what little life remains.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Auch dort leiden die Bewohner unter dem ewig zehrenden Licht und den unbarmherzigen Attacken der Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Even should it cost me all I have, I would see each and every one of them slain, that this world might be spared from oblivion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich kann dieser Ungerechtigkeit nicht zusehen. Ich muss mit all meiner Kraft dagegen ankämpfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Not only for the First, but for the Source as well! Save one and we save the other! But...be that as it may...I concede it was wrong of me to summon you to this fight against your will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich habe euch gegen euren Willen aus eurer Welt gerissen<var 1D /var>- und auch wenn es euch hilft, eure Welt zu retten, so hab ich es doch nur getan, um meine eigenen Ziele zu erreichen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I swear on my life, I will one day atone for that deed. But for the present...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Für diese Tat bin ich bereit mit meinem Leben zu bezahlen, wenn es denn sein muss. Aber dennoch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I beg you stay and see this fight to its conclusion. Cast down the Wardens, and restore Darkness to the First!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich flehe dich an! Steh mir bei! Kämpfe mit mir, und bringe dieser Welt die Dunkelheit zurück!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will become the Warrior you need.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde als <var 08 E905 ((Kriegerin)) ((Krieger)) /var> der Dunkelheit für dich kämpfen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It sounds like a glorious adventure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Na, das klingt doch nach einer ordentlichen Keilerei!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>It seems I've no choice but to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_A15_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was bleibt mir anderes übrig<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On behalf of the First, I offer you my deepest thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Haaa<var 1D /var>... Danke.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005150_ALISAIE<tab>I understand there is much at stake here, Exarch, but why do you risk yourself so readily? It must have been a dangerous drain on your aether to summon even one person across the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005150_ALISAIE<tab>Entschuldige, aber darf ich fragen, warum du das alles auf dich nimmst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I do it for my people, of course─to give the Crystarium the tomorrow it deserves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Natürlich für die Bewohner von Crystarium. Ich fühle mich für sie verantwortlich und wünsche mir, dass sie ihr Leben in Frieden führen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005170_ALISAIE<tab>That is true <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>, yes─but the city had yet to be built when you first called forth the Crystal Tower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005170_ALISAIE<tab>Das bestreite ich auch nicht. Aber als du den Kristallturm in diese Welt gerufen hast, gab es die Stadt noch gar nicht, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005180_ALISAIE<tab>I'm simply curious to know what prompted you to commit yourself so completely to this particular course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005180_ALISAIE<tab>Was hat dich überhaupt veranlasst, für diese Welt zu kämpfen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>There are...things which we can ill afford to lose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es gibt jemanden, den ich retten möchte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And...I sensed from the first that I had a part to play in preserving them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Diese Person bedeutete<var 1D /var>... sie bedeutet mir so viel, dass ich bereit bin, ihretwillen die ganze Welt zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05000_005210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Forgive me. I fear the events of the day may have taken their toll.
